title: At the Intersection of Artificiality, Forward Piercing Not Allowed
affiliations: Singapore Management University - Yong Pung How School of Law

detail.title: At the Intersection of Artificiality, Forward Piercing Not Allowed
detail.abstract:
When the sham doctrine, Ramsay principle in tax law, and attempts to pierce the corporate veil all appear in a single case, it is a good bet that the dispute centres around artificiality. In Hurstwood Properties v Rossendale BC, the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom had occasion to review an application to strike out claims for the recovery of business rates by local authorities. The registered owners of non-domestic properties had engaged in two business rates avoidance schemes and argued that as a result, the local authorities had no reasonable grounds for bringing the claims.

The Court thus had to decide whether there were reasonable grounds for arguing that the three doctrines could be applicable in the case before it and proceeded to consider them seriatim in that specific order. The case is a notable one, being a rare situation where the Ramsay principle was pleaded alongside an attempt to pierce the corporate veil. It expressly affirms the applicability of the Ramsay principle outside of the strict confines of revenue law, though this note will analyse whether the Court actually applied the Ramsay principle, or a form of purposive interpretation. The case also uses the language of forward and reverse piercing of the corporate veil, expressly recognising what was only briefly alluded to by Baroness Hale in Prest v Petrodel, and noting that there appears to be very little room for the former to operate.

AI.tldr: 英国最高法院在Hurstwood Properties v Rossendale BC案中审查了地方当局追讨商业税款的申请，涉及虚假交易、Ramsay原则和公司面纱刺破问题。法院确认了Ramsay原则在税收法之外的适用性，并探讨了公司面纱刺破的有限空间。
AI.research_question: 法院是否能够适用虚假交易、Ramsay原则和公司面纱刺破这三种法律原则来支持地方当局追讨商业税款的申请？
AI.motivation: 该案涉及商业税款避税行为，法院需明确相关法律原则的适用性，以维护税收公平和法律确定性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 虚假交易原则、Ramsay原则（税收反避税原则）、公司面纱刺破理论。
AI.method: 法院通过逐一分析三种法律原则的适用性，结合案件事实进行法律推理。
AI.findings: 法院确认Ramsay原则可适用于税收法之外的领域，并指出公司面纱刺破（尤其是正向刺破）在实践中空间有限。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了Ramsay原则的适用范围，明确了公司面纱刺破理论的边界。
AI.practical_contributions: 为类似避税案件的司法裁决提供了参考，强化了税收法律的执行力度。

detail.title: Beneficial Ownership in Domestic Tax Legislation, Some Clarity, But Far from “Well Established”

publicationDetails.detailsText: “Beneficial Ownership in Domestic Tax Legislation, Some Clarity, But Far From ‘Well Established’” (2025) Legal Studies (Forthcoming)

detail.abstract: The concept of beneficial ownership is extensively used in domestic tax legislation, but several decades of inconsistent case law have muddied the waters as to exactly what it means. With the leading cases stopping short of the apex court, it is difficult to reconcile the cases and come up with a clear definition of beneficial ownership. The recent Hargreaves decision by Falk LJ (with whom Nugee and Peter Jackson LJJ agreed) represents the most structured judicial attempt to rationalise the concept to date. This note humbly suggests that contrary to Falk LJ’s statement that the concept is “well established”, the law pre-Hargreaves was far from clear. This situation has since been greatly improved through the efforts of Falk LJ, though further questions remain for future judicial clarification.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了“受益所有权”概念在法律中的模糊性，指出Hargreaves案是目前最系统的司法尝试，但仍需进一步澄清。
AI.research_question: 如何定义和澄清‘受益所有权’的法律概念？
AI.motivation: 由于国内税法中‘受益所有权’概念长期缺乏明确界定，司法判例不一致，导致法律适用混乱。
AI.theoretical_framework: 受益所有权的法律定义及其在判例中的演变。
AI.method: 通过分析Hargreaves案及其之前的判例，探讨司法对‘受益所有权’的界定。
AI.findings: Hargreaves案是目前最系统的司法尝试，但此前法律定义仍不清晰，仍需进一步澄清。
AI.theory_contributions: 为‘受益所有权’的法律定义提供了更清晰的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 有助于减少税法适用中的不确定性，为未来司法判例提供参考。

title: Guest Editorial- Special Issue: Environmental, Social, Governance and Taxation
affiliations: Singapore Management University - Yong Pung How School of Law and University of Edinburgh, Edinburgh Law School

detail.title: Guest Editorial- Special Issue: Environmental, Social, Governance and Taxation
detail.abstract:
This special issue of the eJournal of Tax Research comprises five articles that are a selection of papers that were originally presented at the SMU–Edinburgh Environmental, Social, Governance and Taxation Conference hosted by the Yong Pung How School of Law, Singapore Management University in April 2024. The conference was opened by the Honourable Judicial Commissioner Alex Wong Li Kok of the Supreme Court of Singapore, who assured attendees that the importance of environmental, social, governance (ESG) aspirations was not lost on the judiciary.

The conference focused on important issues such as whether taxation should form a fourth pillar (ESG(T)), or whether taxation already has an existing home in the existing ESG pillars. It also explored the role that taxation plays in sustainability and environmental protection more generally. The articles in this special issue expand on these core themes, incorporating the rich discussion and feedback provided over the course of the conference.

AI.tldr: 本期特刊包含五篇论文，探讨税收是否应成为ESG的第四支柱（ESG(T)）及其在可持续发展和环境保护中的作用。
AI.research_question: 税收是否应成为ESG的第四支柱（ESG(T)），以及税收在可持续发展和环境保护中的角色是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨税收在ESG框架中的定位及其对可持续发展的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: ESG（环境、社会、治理）框架及其扩展（ESG(T)）。
AI.method: 基于会议的讨论和反馈，结合文献分析。
AI.findings: 税收在可持续发展和环境保护中具有重要作用，但其是否应单独列为ESG的第四支柱仍需进一步探讨。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了ESG框架的理论边界，提出税收作为潜在第四支柱的可能性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供了税收在ESG中角色的实践指导。

title: The Privatisation of Sport
affiliations: Monash University - Faculty of Law

detail.title: The Privatisation of Sport

publicationDetails.detailsText: Published in G. Hodge, C. Greve and E. Reeves (eds), Research Handbook on Privatisation (Edward Elgar, 2025), Ch. 16, pp. 320-336

detail.abstract: This chapter examines the privatisation of sport which, at first glance, might appear counter-intuitive given sport overwhelmingly is run by private entities. However, this perspective is too superficial. Sport inherently is a hybrid public-private good. However, its public elements are being withdrawn from the public sphere by private money and interests – which is the essence of privatisation broadly understood. While some of the impacts and implications of sports’ privatisation are positive; others are deeply troubling. This has led to calls for governments to play a more prominent and assertive role mediating sports’ private and public interests to protect sport from private money’s dark side. The result is likely to be a fundamental change in how sports are governed in the future.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨了体育私有化的现象，尽管体育主要由私营实体运营，但其本质是公私混合产品。私有化正在将体育的公共元素从公共领域剥离，带来积极和消极影响，呼吁政府更积极地调解公私利益。
AI.research_question: 体育私有化的本质及其对体育治理的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 体育私有化现象看似矛盾，但其对公共利益的侵蚀引发了研究需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 体育作为公私混合产品的理论框架。
AI.method: 文献分析与理论探讨。
AI.findings: 私有化带来积极与消极影响，需政府干预以平衡公私利益。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对体育作为公私混合产品的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府制定体育政策提供理论支持。

title: Beneficial Ownership and the Attribution of the Res in UK Tax Law
affiliations: Singapore Management University - Yong Pung How School of Law

detail.title: Beneficial Ownership and the Attribution of the Res in UK Tax Law

publicationDetails.detailsText: Beneficial Ownership and the Attribution of the Res in UK Tax Law (Cambridge) (2023)

detail.abstract: In UK tax law, the beneficial ownership concept is an important method of attribution which connects a res to an owner for the purposes of tax law. The title of this thesis may be broken down into four components: 1) beneficial ownership; 2) attribution; 3) res; and 4) UK tax law. This thesis will therefore explore what beneficial ownership is, how it performs its main function of attributing a res to a person, what a res is and what other rights may be attributed, and how the above applies within the confines of UK tax law. This thesis briefly discusses related (but distinct) concepts of beneficial ownership in other areas of tax law but focuses on the concept as it applies in the context of what it refers to as ‘UK domestic tax law’. Beneficial ownership is part of a group of related concepts (referred to collectively in this thesis as ‘combined subdivision variants’) which largely serve a similar purpose and are often interchangeably used. More broadly, beneficial ownership is one of several methods of attribution used in UK tax law to connect a res (or, more broadly, an asset) to a person for various tax purposes. This thesis considers the distinctiveness of the beneficial ownership concept and how it fits within this broad taxonomy of methods of attribution. Four main research questions have been framed and answered by this thesis: 1) why is it important to attribute assets (and res) to persons under UK tax law; 2) what are the methods of attribution (especially beneficial ownership) and how are they used in UK tax law; 3) how can the methods of attribution be used in legislative drafting to achieve tax policy goals; and 4) how might a framework for using methods of attribution to achieve drafting goals be developed?

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了英国税法中的‘受益所有权’概念，分析了其作为资产归属方法的功能、相关权利及在税法中的应用，并提出了四个研究问题。
AI.research_question: 1) 为什么在英国税法中将资产（及res）归属于个人是重要的？2) 归属方法（尤其是受益所有权）是什么，它们如何在英国税法中使用？3) 如何在立法草案中使用归属方法以实现税收政策目标？4) 如何开发一个框架以使用归属方法实现草案目标？
AI.motivation: 研究受益所有权在英国税法中的作用及其与其他归属方法的区别，为立法和政策制定提供理论支持。
AI.theoretical_framework: 受益所有权作为资产归属的核心概念，与其他‘组合细分变体’共同服务于类似目的。
AI.method: 通过分析英国国内税法的相关案例和立法文本，探讨受益所有权的功能和应用。
AI.findings: 明确了受益所有权的独特性及其在税法中的具体应用，提出了归属方法的分类框架。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了受益所有权在税法中的理论理解，提出了归属方法的分类和功能分析。
AI.practical_contributions: 为立法者和政策制定者提供了使用归属方法实现税收政策目标的实用框架。

title: Decoding the Rise of Central Bank Digital Currency in China: Designs, Problems, and Prospects
affiliations: The University of Hong Kong - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Decoding the Rise of Central Bank Digital Currency in China: Designs, Problems, and Prospects
detail.abstract: During the Covid-19 pandemic, there has been a rapid shift in global transaction patterns from offline to online digital payment models, along with a growing interest in the development of Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) in various countries. This article spotlights the unexamined issue of digital currency regulation by examining the practice and related regulatory rules of the pilot CBDC in China. Beginning with the global design choices of digital currencies, the article comparatively examines the technical design of China's CBDC, known as e-CNY. It further triggers a rethinking of conventional regulations for the protection of digital currency information by investigating the gap between the actual operation and design of e-CNY, as well as the gap between pilot policies and legal provisions such as the Cybersecurity Law, the Data Security Law, and the Personal Information Protection Law. This article argues that, on the one hand, the legislative balance between the protection of personal information and the regulation of illicit financial activities involved in the "loosely coupled account link" system of e-CNY should be reconsidered. On the other hand, the delineation of rights and responsibilities between dissemination institutions, payment service providers, and end-users needs to be further redefined and clarified.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了新冠疫情下全球交易模式向数字支付的转变，聚焦中国央行数字货币（e-CNY）的实践与监管问题，分析了其技术设计与实际运行的差距，并提出了对个人信息保护与金融监管平衡的重新思考。
AI.research_question: 如何通过中国央行数字货币（e-CNY）的实践与监管规则，重新思考数字时代下个人信息保护与金融监管的平衡？
AI.motivation: 全球交易模式向数字支付转变及各国对央行数字货币的兴趣，引发了数字货币监管的未探索问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 数字货币政策、个人信息保护法、数据安全法、网络安全法。
AI.method: 比较分析中国e-CNY的技术设计与实际运行，以及试点政策与法律条款的差距。
AI.findings: e-CNY的“松耦合账户链接”系统在个人信息保护与金融监管之间存在立法平衡问题，相关权责划分需进一步明确。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了数字时代下个人信息保护与金融监管平衡的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为央行数字货币的监管政策制定提供了实践建议。

title: In-Service Safety Performance Evaluation of Road Barrier Terminals
affiliations: Purdue University, Purdue University and Purdue University

detail.title: In-Service Safety Performance Evaluation of Road Barrier Terminals
detail.abstract: Collisions with barrier terminals tend to have more severe outcomes than those with barrier faces. Most studies of collisions with barrier terminals were done more than twenty years ago. The safety performance evaluation of in-service barrier terminals is overdue given the considerable evolution of vehicles design and introduction of modified types of barriers terminals. Thus, this study evaluated the safety performance of alternative barrier terminals under the current traffic and vehicles in traffic. This study was meant to help Indiana safety engineers identify the effective barrier terminal under certain local conditions.Eight years of crash records in Indiana were linked to the corresponding barrier terminals in Indiana Road Network Dataset. Potential safety factors, such as road functional class, speed limit, presence of close intersections or ramps, vehicle types, operating speed, road surface and weather conditions were collected. Safety performance of a barrier terminal was viewed in this study as its capability of reducing crash severity. It was done under the premise that the probability of hitting a barrier terminal at a certain location was independent of the barrier end type thanks to their comparable exposition to traffic. A random parameter ordered logit model was estimated to associate crash severity levels with barrier terminals and other safety factors. The Monte Carlo simulation was then used to estimate the severity outcomes of the studied alternative barrier terminals. This performance was expressed with the severity outcome distribution and with the expected average cost of a collision outcome. The results indicate that SKT barrier terminal perform consistently well, followed by ETPlus, and CAT.

AI.tldr: 该研究评估了当前交通和车辆条件下替代护栏终端的安全性能，发现SKT护栏终端表现最佳，其次是ETPlus和CAT。
AI.research_question: 在当前交通和车辆条件下，替代护栏终端的安全性能如何？
AI.motivation: 护栏终端碰撞的后果通常比护栏面更严重，且过去的研究已过时，需重新评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于随机参数有序Logit模型和蒙特卡洛模拟，分析护栏终端的安全性能。
AI.method: 使用印第安纳州八年的碰撞记录和道路网络数据集，结合多种安全因素，建立模型评估护栏终端的安全性能。
AI.findings: SKT护栏终端表现最佳，其次是ETPlus和CAT。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了评估护栏终端安全性能的新方法，结合了多种安全因素和模型分析。
AI.practical_contributions: 为印第安纳州的安全工程师提供了选择有效护栏终端的依据。

title: Monetary Policy Transmission to Lending Rates: Evidence from Brazil
affiliations: International Monetary Fund (IMF) and International Monetary Fund (IMF)

detail.title: Monetary Policy Transmission to Lending Rates: Evidence from Brazil

declarations.declarationOfInterest: IMF Working Papers describe research in progress by the author(s) and are published to elicit comments and to encourage debate. The views expressed in IMF Working Papers are those of the author(s) and do not necessarily represent the views of the IMF, its Executive Board, or IMF management.

detail.abstract: This paper estimates the strength of monetary policy transmission to bank lending rates in Brazil. We identify monetary policy shocks using forecast errors from Brazi’s daily Focus survey of professional forecasters. We then estimate the pass-through to lending rates based on an instrumental variable application of local projections and find an aggregate pass-through of 70 percent after four months, reflecting full passthrough to market-based lending rates and 20 percent to government-directed credit interest rates. Analysis using bank-level data reveals varying degrees of pass-through across credit types, from 40 percent for payrollbacked loans to 80 percent for working capital loans, and stronger pass-through for larger banks. Estimated pass-through has increased since 2020 due to more responsive corporate loans.

AI.tldr: 本文估计了巴西货币政策传导至银行贷款利率的强度，发现四个月内总体传导率为70%，其中市场化贷款利率完全传导，政府指导信贷利率传导率为20%。不同信贷类型传导率差异显著，且大银行的传导更强。2020年后传导率因企业贷款反应增强而提高。
AI.research_question: 巴西货币政策传导至银行贷款利率的强度如何？
AI.motivation: 研究货币政策传导机制对理解政策效果及银行信贷市场行为至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 货币政策传导理论，重点关注利率传导机制。
AI.method: 利用巴西每日Focus调查的预测误差识别货币政策冲击，采用工具变量法和局部投影估计传导率。
AI.findings: 四个月内总体传导率为70%，市场化贷款利率完全传导，政府指导信贷利率传导率为20%。不同信贷类型传导率差异显著（40%-80%），大银行传导更强。2020年后传导率提高。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了货币政策传导理论，特别是对新兴市场国家的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者优化货币政策工具和银行信贷市场管理提供依据。

reference: Law and Human Behavior, volume 42, issue 2, 2018[10.1037/lhb0000271]
title: Legitimacy versus Morality: Why Do the Chinese Obey the Law?
affiliations: University of Illinois College of Law and Massachusetts Institute of Technology

detail.title: Legitimacy versus Morality: Why Do the Chinese Obey the Law?

publicationDetails.detailsText: Law and Human Behavior, volume 42, issue 2, 2018[10.1037/lhb0000271]

detail.abstract: This study explored two aspects of the rule of law in China: (1) motivations for compliance with 4 groups of everyday laws and regulations and (2) determinants of the legitimacy of legal authorities. We applied a structural equations model, constructed from Tyler's conceptual process-based self-regulation model with morality added as a motivation, to online questionnaire responses from 1,000 Shanghai drivers. We explored the compliance with four particular groups of laws: public disturbance; conventional traffic laws; illegal downloading; and distracted driving. The results were threefold. First, for all four groups of laws, the perceived morality influenced compliance consistently and more strongly than the perceived legitimacy of the authorities and all other motivations. The influence of perceived legitimacy of authorities was inconsistent across the four groups of laws tested. Second, the influence of perceived severity of punishment was consistent and significant across all four groups of laws, whereas perceived risk of apprehension had no significant impact on compliance. Third, evaluations of procedural fairness, not those concerning the equitable distribution of law enforcement services and effectiveness of law enforcement, were most strongly linked to legitimacy. In addition to showing that China is a law-abiding society governed by morality, these results underscore the importance of examining morality and magnitude of punishment as potential motivations for compliance in addition to legitimacy and certainty of punishment. They also illustrate the necessity to examine different groups of laws separately when studying compliance. Finally, these results challenge the linkage between legitimacy and compliance previously established in the literature. Public Significance Statement This study of Shanghai residents underscores the importance of normative motivations in compliance with law. Perceived morality is found to influence compliance consistently and more strongly than all other motivations. In addition, the study identifies procedural fairness as the primary antecedent of legitimacy. These findings show that focusing on moral inculcation and enforcing the law fairly are more important than expending more public resources on enforcement in obtaining compliance with the law and maintaining social order.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了中国法治的两个方面：日常法律法规的遵守动机和法律权威合法性的决定因素。通过结构方程模型分析上海1000名司机的问卷数据，发现道德感知对遵守行为的影响最强，而惩罚严重性也有显著影响。程序公平性是合法性的主要决定因素。
AI.research_question: 中国法治中，日常法律法规的遵守动机和法律权威合法性的决定因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 探索中国社会法治的实际运作机制，特别是道德和合法性对法律遵守的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Tyler的过程导向自我调节模型，并加入道德作为动机因素。
AI.method: 在线问卷调查1000名上海司机，采用结构方程模型分析数据。
AI.findings: 1. 道德感知对法律遵守的影响最强且一致；2. 惩罚严重性对所有法律组别均有显著影响；3. 程序公平性是合法性的主要决定因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了合法性对法律遵守的传统观点，强调道德和程序公平性的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议政府注重道德教育和公平执法，而非单纯增加执法资源。

title: The GENIUS Dilemma: Innovation Versus Antifraud in Stablecoin Regulation
affiliations: University of New Hampshire Franklin Pierce School of Law

detail.title: The GENIUS Dilemma: Innovation Versus Antifraud in Stablecoin Regulation
detail.abstract:
The 2022 TerraUSD collapse, erasing $50 billion and exposing unregulated stablecoin risks in a $260 billion market, led Congress to enact the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for U.S. Stablecoins Act of 2025 (GENIUS Act). This statute exempts compliant payment stablecoins from the Securities Act’s “security” definition, enforces strict reserve requirements, and creates a tailored private right of action—shifting authority from ex post Rule 10b-5 litigation to ex ante prudential oversight while maintaining market discipline via calibrated remedies.

As the first doctrinal analysis of this landmark legislation, this Article contends GENIUS resolves regulatory fragmentation, optimizes risk allocation under uncertainty, and bolsters U.S. global leadership in digital assets. Yet it reveals latent tensions, including potential jurisdictional overlaps and diluted antifraud measures, that require rapid rulemaking and interagency coordination to avert persistent issues. In fintech’s dynamic era, GENIUS could solidify stablecoins as digital payment pillars, but demands vigilant execution to balance innovation and stability without repeating past failures.

The Article examines GENIUS’s structure, doctrinal/policy impacts, and implementation roadmap, because, if implemented well, it cements stablecoins’ future—else, it risks exacerbating the fragmentation it targets.

AI.tldr: 2022年TerraUSD崩盘导致500亿美元损失，促使美国国会通过2025年《GENIUS法案》，旨在规范稳定币市场。法案通过豁免合规支付稳定币的证券定义、严格储备要求和定制私人诉讼权，优化监管框架。文章分析法案的潜在问题及实施路径，强调其平衡创新与稳定的重要性。
AI.research_question: GENIUS法案如何解决稳定币市场的监管碎片化问题？
AI.motivation: TerraUSD崩盘暴露了稳定币市场的监管漏洞，亟需立法规范以防范风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于金融监管理论和风险分配理论，分析法案的监管框架设计。
AI.method: 通过法案文本分析和政策影响评估，探讨其法律与政策意义。
AI.findings: GENIUS法案通过优化监管框架解决了碎片化问题，但仍需解决潜在管辖权冲突和反欺诈措施弱化问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 为金融监管和数字资产领域的法律研究提供了新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了实施GENIUS法案的具体建议，以平衡创新与市场稳定。

title: Government Purchase of Surplus Inventory Without Price Constraints: The San Diego Chargers Ticket Guarantee
affiliations: University of Colorado at Denver - School of Public Affairs and University of Michigan at Ann Arbor

detail.title: Government Purchase of Surplus Inventory Without Price Constraints: The San Diego Chargers Ticket Guarantee
detail.abstract: As part of lease negotiations with the NFL's then-San Diego Chargers in the mid 1990s, the city of San Diego agreed to purchase unsold tickets to regular season games. City lawmakers did not put a limit on the amount they would be willing to pay, reimbursing at the team's set price. Economic theory suggests the team would raise prices to infinity. Notwithstanding this being impossible in the real world, as a lease-bound and socially conspicuous for-profit business, the team faced political and potential legal costs if ticket prices increased too much. This scenario created a unique situation with a theoretically ambiguous price effect. We use the synthetic control method to estimate the team's ticket price response. Our preferred design indicates the team raised prices on average 23 percent over the life of the guarantee, and robustness checks put the mean price response consistently between 20 and 30 percent.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了圣地亚哥市在1990年代与NFL球队的租约谈判中同意购买未售出比赛门票对票价的影响，发现球队平均将票价提高了23%。
AI.research_question: 圣地亚哥市同意购买未售出比赛门票的行为如何影响球队的票价设定？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在分析政府干预对市场价格设定的影响，尤其是在体育产业中的独特案例。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于经济理论，探讨无限制补贴对价格设定的潜在影响及现实约束（如政治和法律成本）。
AI.method: 采用合成控制法（synthetic control method）估计球队的票价反应。
AI.findings: 球队在保证期内平均将票价提高了23%，稳健性检验显示价格反应在20%至30%之间。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了政府补贴对市场价格设定的实际影响，补充了经济理论在现实约束下的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于政府干预市场价格的潜在后果的实证证据。

title: The Safety Effect of Rumble Strips in Various Road Conditions on Rural Two-Lane Roads
affiliations: Purdue University, Purdue University and Purdue University

detail.title: The Safety Effect of Rumble Strips in Various Road Conditions on Rural Two-Lane Roads
detail.abstract: Rumble strips placed along sides (edge or shoulder) and centerlines are meant to reduce lane departure crashes by altering drivers. While many studies have examined their safety effectiveness, few have explored alternative configurations (size, placement and profile) under varying road and traffic conditions. This study conducted a comprehensive analysis using a large dataset of Indiana rural two-lane roads, incorporating crash data, rumble strip configurations, traffic volumes, and road geometry. A total of 13,258 lane departure crashes from 2015 to 2022 were mapped to 4,516 segments along 571 road sections. To address crash count overdispersion due to unobserved heterogeneity among sections and across years, nested random effect negative binomial models were estimated separately for property-damage-only (PDO) crashes and fatal-or-injury (FI) crashes. Results confirmed the safety benefits of rumble strips with significant differences by placement and profile. Conventional rumble strips outperformed sinusoidal ones, and combining centerline and side rumble strips offer better performance. Side rumble strips were particularly effective in reducing FI crashes on roads with narrow shoulders, while centerline-only rumble strips were less effective on curved segments. These findings support more informed decisions about rumble strips design and placement, aiding in the development of targeted installation strategies for improved road safety.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过分析印第安纳州乡村双车道公路上的13,258起车道偏离事故，探讨了不同配置（尺寸、位置和轮廓）的震动带在减少事故中的效果。研究发现，传统震动带优于正弦震动带，且结合中心线和侧边震动带效果更佳。
AI.research_question: 不同配置的震动带（尺寸、位置和轮廓）如何影响乡村双车道公路上的车道偏离事故？
AI.motivation: 尽管震动带已被证明能减少车道偏离事故，但关于其不同配置在多样化道路和交通条件下的效果研究较少。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于负二项回归模型，考虑了路段和年份的未观察异质性，分析了震动带配置对事故的影响。
AI.method: 使用2015至2022年的13,258起车道偏离事故数据，结合震动带配置、交通量和道路几何特征，建立嵌套随机效应负二项模型。
AI.findings: 传统震动带效果优于正弦震动带；结合中心线和侧边震动带效果最佳；侧边震动带在窄路肩道路上对减少严重事故特别有效。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了震动带配置与事故减少之间关系的理论理解，尤其是针对不同道路条件的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为震动带的设计和安装提供了针对性建议，有助于提升道路安全策略的制定。

title: Interaction Patterns Exploration and Risk Assessment within Lane Changing in Terms of Initial Scenarios and Evolution Process
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Interaction Patterns Exploration and Risk Assessment within Lane Changing in Terms of Initial Scenarios and Evolution Process
detail.abstract: The lane-changing (LC) process is a sequential interaction process influenced by multiple factors, including the driver's decision-making, speed, traffic density, road conditions, and the behavior of surrounding vehicles. However, it remains unclear in which scenarios drivers tend to execute lane changes and how the lane changing vehicle and the surrounding vehicles jointly complete the entire lane-changing process in these scenarios. This research establishes a two-level integrated clustering framework tailored to the specifics of LC interactions. At the upper level, the normalized k-means algorithm and pairwise aggregation SSE (sum of the squared errors) are jointly used in this research to handle high-dimensional data and analyze the scenarios in which drivers tend to execute lane changes (i.e., LC initial-scenario). At the lower level, the interaction feature extraction method is utilized to explore the LC interaction patterns corresponding to different LC initial-scenarios. Based on the highD trajectory data and the aforementioned two-level integrated clustering framework, this research identifies 9 major LC initial scenarios and 20 major LC interaction patterns of human drivers, and establishes the relationships between different LC initial scenarios and LC interaction patterns. Particularly, we discover that the interaction patterns could be further categorized into global general pattern, local general pattern, and special pattern. Additionally, by introducing the driving risk quantification indicators, this research identifies risky and safe LC initial scenarios and interaction patterns. The findings offer an in-depth understanding of the entire lane-changing process, providing a theoretical foundation for autonomous driving tests, lane-changing collaborative design, and traffic warning systems.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过两级聚类框架分析了车道变换（LC）的初始场景和交互模式，识别了9种主要LC初始场景和20种交互模式，并发现交互模式可分为全局通用、局部通用和特殊模式。研究还量化了驾驶风险，为自动驾驶测试和交通预警系统提供了理论基础。
AI.research_question: 在哪些场景中驾驶员倾向于执行车道变换，以及车道变换车辆与周围车辆如何共同完成整个车道变换过程？
AI.motivation: 车道变换是一个受多种因素影响的交互过程，但目前尚不清楚驾驶员在哪些场景中倾向于执行车道变换及其交互模式。
AI.theoretical_framework: 两级集成聚类框架（上层：标准化k-means算法和SSE；下层：交互特征提取方法）。
AI.method: 基于highD轨迹数据和两级聚类框架，分析LC初始场景和交互模式。
AI.findings: 识别了9种LC初始场景和20种交互模式，交互模式可分为全局通用、局部通用和特殊模式；量化了驾驶风险。
AI.theory_contributions: 为车道变换过程提供了深入理解，建立了LC初始场景与交互模式的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为自动驾驶测试、车道变换协同设计和交通预警系统提供了理论基础。

title: Easier Citizen Science Is Better
affiliations: University of Virginia

detail.title: Easier Citizen Science Is Better
detail.abstract:
Non-scientists are now participating in research in ways that were previously impossible, thanks to more web-based projects to collect and analyse data. Here we suggest a way to encourage broader participation while increasing the quality of data.

Participation may be passive, as when someone donates their computer's 'downtime' to projects such as SETI@home, or active, as when someone uses eBird to log birds they have spotted. Unfortunately, the prevailing data-collection and storage practices for active projects inhibit participation by non-experts.

Many projects rely on positive identification, whether explicitly (as for eBird) or by soliciting photographs and descriptions that others can use to classify the observation (as for the UK website iSpot). Because non-experts often lack the knowledge to identify species, they may opt not to participate or may provide inaccurate data by accidentally misidentifying something. The result is a trade-off between participation and data quality.

This trade-off can be avoided simply by changing the way information is collected and stored. Participants should be given the option to report a sighting in terms of observed attributes, eliminating the need to force a (possibly incorrect) classification. For example, allowing someone to report a bird as oil-covered may be more valuable than asking them to guess what the species is. For such data to be used effectively, they need to be stored in a way that supports attributes rather than fixed, predetermined classes.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种通过改变数据收集和存储方式来鼓励非专家参与科学研究的方法，避免因分类要求而降低数据质量或抑制参与。
AI.research_question: 如何通过改进数据收集和存储方式，鼓励非专家参与科学研究并提高数据质量？
AI.motivation: 当前的数据收集方式（如要求准确分类）可能抑制非专家的参与或导致数据不准确，因此需要一种更灵活的方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于非专家参与科学研究的障碍与数据质量之间的权衡理论。
AI.method: 提出一种基于属性报告的数据收集方法，而非强制分类。
AI.findings: 通过允许参与者报告观察属性而非强制分类，可以避免数据质量与参与度之间的权衡。
AI.theory_contributions: 为科学公民参与提供了新的理论视角，强调数据收集方式的灵活性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为科学项目设计者提供了改进数据收集和存储的具体建议，以吸引更多非专家参与。

title: Modelling Customer Satisfaction in Quick Commerce: An Integrated Approach Using Efa, Tism and K-Means
affiliations: IIT Delhi and Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Delhi - Department of Management Studies

detail.title: Modelling Customer Satisfaction in Quick Commerce: An Integrated Approach Using Efa, Tism and K-Means
detail.abstract: Quick commerce is experiencing accelerated growth. This study identifies and models the key enablers of customer satisfaction in quick commerce using a multi-method approach. Based on survey data from 457 consumers, Exploratory Factor Analysis (EFA) reveals four latent constructs—Service Quality, Economic Value, Product Quality, and Product Assortment—collectively termed the SEPA-Q framework. Total Interpretive Structural Modelling (TISM) maps these constructs into a nine-level hierarchy, highlighting Assortment Availability and Service Quality and as foundational enablers that shape higher-order perceptions of value and quality. MICMAC analysis further classifies individual variables based on their driving and dependence power. Complementing this structural analysis, K-means clustering segments consumers into four distinct groups – Engaged Enthusiasts, Assortment Seekers, Price Conscious and Disengaged – with differentiated satisfaction profiles, offering empirical validation of the SEPA-Q model. Together, these insights provide a robust, actionable framework for managers to design targeted interventions that enhance satisfaction and long-term engagement in the quick commerce ecosystem.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过多方法分析快速商务中客户满意度的关键驱动因素，提出了SEPA-Q框架，并通过TISM和MICMAC分析揭示了其层级结构和变量分类，同时通过K-means聚类将消费者分为四类，为管理者提供了针对性的改进建议。
AI.research_question: 快速商务中客户满意度的关键驱动因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 快速商务的快速增长需要理解客户满意度的驱动因素以优化服务。
AI.theoretical_framework: SEPA-Q框架（服务质量、经济价值、产品质量和产品多样性）
AI.method: 多方法研究：EFA、TISM、MICMAC分析和K-means聚类。
AI.findings: SEPA-Q框架的四个维度对客户满意度有显著影响，消费者可分为四类。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了SEPA-Q框架，扩展了快速商务领域的理论模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为管理者提供了针对不同消费者群体的满意度提升策略。

title: Deconstructing the Global Retail Customer Experience: A Transformer-Based Analysis of Thematic Drivers and Sentiment on Reddit
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Deconstructing the Global Retail Customer Experience: A Transformer-Based Analysis of Thematic Drivers and Sentiment on Reddit
detail.abstract: This research investigates the primary drivers of customer satisfaction in the contemporary global retail sector by applying a state-of-the-art Natural Language Processing (NLP) pipeline to a large corpus of unsolicited customer feedback from Reddit. The study moves beyond the limitations of traditional survey methods and simplistic computational analyses by employing a sophisticated, data-driven methodology to analyze discussions pertaining to the Top 50 Global Retailers. The analytical framework integrates two advanced techniques: BERTopic, a transformer-based topic modeling algorithm, for the semantic discovery of latent thematic categories, and a fine-tuned RoBERTa model (cardiffnlp/twitter-roberta-base-sentiment-latest), for nuanced, context-aware sentiment classification. The analysis reveals three dominant, empirically-derived thematic categories in customer discourse: Physical, Cognitive, and Social. Principal findings indicate that Physical factors, encompassing e-commerce usability, delivery logistics, and the in-store environment, are the most frequently discussed dimensions of the retail experience, comprising 39.5% of the discourse. Conversely, Social factors, related to customer service interactions, emerge as the most significant source of customer friction, exhibiting the highest proportion of negative sentiment at 43.55%. Cognitive factors, related to price and value, are associated with the most positive sentiment, with positive posts (20.37%) outnumbering negative ones (14.70%). This study makes a dual contribution: first, it presents a robust, scalable, and ethically-grounded methodological framework for interpreting the complexity of unstructured customer feedback from narrative-rich platforms; second, it provides critical, actionable strategic insights for global retailers seeking to diagnose operational weaknesses and enhance customer loyalty in a competitive market

AI.tldr: 本研究通过先进的NLP技术分析Reddit上的客户反馈，揭示了全球零售业客户满意度的三大驱动因素：物理、认知和社会因素，并提出了方法论和实践贡献。
AI.research_question: 当代全球零售业中客户满意度的主要驱动因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 超越传统调查方法的局限性，利用数据驱动方法分析客户反馈，以提供更深入的洞察。
AI.theoretical_framework: BERTopic和RoBERTa模型用于主题建模和情感分析。
AI.method: 使用BERTopic进行主题建模，RoBERTa进行情感分析，分析Top 50全球零售商的客户反馈。
AI.findings: 物理因素（39.5%）最常被讨论，社会因素（43.55%）负面情绪最多，认知因素（20.37%）正面情绪最多。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个可扩展且伦理化的方法论框架，用于分析非结构化客户反馈。
AI.practical_contributions: 为全球零售商提供了诊断运营弱点和提升客户忠诚度的战略洞察。

title: EU AI Act's Impact on Public Sector Use of AI
affiliations: University of Pennsylvania Carey Law School

detail.title: EU AI Act's Impact on Public Sector Use of AI

publicationDetails.detailsText: U of Penn Law School, Public Law Research Paper No. 25-34
publicationDetails.journalName: University of Pennsylvania Carey Law School, Public Law & Legal Theory Research Paper Series

publicationDetails.detailsText: in The EU Artificial Intelligence Act and the Public Sector, Juli Ponce and Agustí Cerrillo-i-Martínez eds., forthcoming

detail.abstract: As the rapid proliferation of innovation in artificial intelligence (AI) transforms major business sectors throughout the global economy, AI is also changing the work of governments around the world. With thousands of public sector AI applications already in use worldwide, this new suite of digital tools offers the potential for better informed, more efficient, and fairer administration across a full range of governmental policies and programs. At the same time, governmental authorities’ use of AI raises significant concerns about bias as well as threats to privacy, transparency, and accountability. In 2024, in response to these concerns, the European Union adopted the most comprehensive and potentially the most consequential law regulating both public and private sector AI use: the EU Artificial Intelligence Act. Unlike more fragmented and permissive regulatory approaches taken by other global powers, such as China and the United States, the EU’s AI Act establishes a binding regulatory scheme that applies across the board to both public and private sector AI use. Perhaps nowhere are the stakes of the Act’s regulatory policies likely to be more apparent than in the public sector, as the Act not only prohibits certain unacceptable AI uses by governments but also imposes requirements on the use of “high-risk” systems—a category that will likely encompass virtually all public sector AI applications that directly affect citizens’ interests, including those used to evaluate eligibility for essential public services, assist law enforcement, and support adjudication. As the Act has begun to be implemented, however, European leaders are starting to react to global competitive pressures and express skepticism about excessive regulatory stringency imposed on AI firms. This tension between the EU AI Act’s comprehensive AI governance scheme and intensifying market pressure facing Europe over AI reflects a deeper challenge facing societies all around the world: how to ensure the safe, fair, and accountable deployment of AI technologies, especially in the public sector, while also securing the benefits that these new technological innovations can provide the public. Navigating this challenge will be critical to ensuring responsible AI governance today and in the years to come. This essay serves as the foreword to the first major scholarly volume to focus comprehensively on the implications of the EU AI Act for public sector use of AI. The EU Artificial Intelligence Act and the Public Sector, edited by Juli Ponce and Agustí Cerrillo-i-Martínez, could not come at a more crucial time, as the EU AI Act’s comprehensive governance approach to promoting careful and accountable deployment of AI by governmental entities is being implemented against an ever-shifting geopolitical and economic landscape.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了欧盟《人工智能法案》对公共部门AI应用的影响，分析了其在全球AI治理中的独特地位及面临的挑战。

title: Innovations in E-Waste Management and Recycling
affiliations: Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune, Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune, Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune and Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune

detail.title: Innovations in E-Waste Management and Recycling
detail.abstract: The rapid growth of electronic devices has led to a significant rise in electronic waste (e-waste), posing serious environmental and health hazards. This research addresses the pressing problem of inefficient e-waste disposal and the need for innovative recycling solutions. The primary objectives are to identify recent technological and policy innovations in e-waste management and to evaluate their effectiveness in reducing environmental impact. A qualitative methodology was adopted, involving a comprehensive review of current literature, case studies from developed and developing countries, and expert interviews. The study reveals key innovations, including AI-powered sorting systems, robotic disassembly, advanced material recovery techniques, and circular economy models supported by extended producer responsibility (EPR) policies. Findings indicate that these advancements significantly enhance recycling efficiency, resource recovery, and sustainability. The research concludes that integrating technology with policy reforms is essential for a scalable and sustainable e-waste management system, highlighting the urgent need for global collaboration and public awareness to tackle the growing e-waste crisis effectively.

AI.method: 定性研究方法，包括文献综述、案例分析和专家访谈。

AI.practical_contributions: 为全球电子废物管理提供了可扩展的解决方案，强调了国际合作和公众意识的重要性。

title: A Peer-2-Peer Electronic Health Record System Streamlining Healthcare Delivery During Short Term Medical Mission Clinics
affiliations: NUS High School of Mathematics and Science and Tan Tock Seng Hospital

detail.title: A Peer-2-Peer Electronic Health Record System Streamlining Healthcare Delivery During Short Term Medical Mission Clinics
detail.abstract: Background Short-term medical missions (STMMs) provide resource-limited regions with immediate healthcare services and can play a helpful role in bridging critical gaps in healthcare access, providing essential services, and contributing to capacity building in underserved communities. However, STMM teams have the potential to cause harm due to unfamiliarity with the patient population, culture, and disease epidemiology. Specifically, mobile primary care clinics run by STMMs are run in-silos and are not linked with any existing electronic health records system, creating room for potential medical errors. To date, there have been limited attempts to tailor Electronic Health Records (EHR) to STMM mobile clinics and existing systems remain in early developmental stages. Objective  To develop an EHR system suited for STMMs that does not depend on internet connectivity, improves patient safety and patient care processes, and has longer-term sustainable applications. Methods Traditional STMM clinic processes are described, and historical post-trip feedback were retrieved. Brainstorming with stakeholders was conducted to determine the essential features of the EHR system. A solution was chosen which involved the decentralisation of data over a peer-2-peer network functioning over a local area network (LAN) provided by any portable router. Results The process of development, implementation, troubleshooting of this EHR during an STMM in Timor-Leste over 5 days in both urban and rural locations is described. Post-implementation qualitative feedback has been encouraging especially in the aspect of clinic process, medication safety and ease of data access, analysis, and sharing. Discussion While this EHR has been useful, there are limitations such as the need for a stable power supply to the router and the lack of unique identifiers for patients in some settings that prohibits the linking of data across databases. Nonetheless, the development of our EHR is an important step in the right direction.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一种适用于短期医疗任务（STMMs）的电子健康记录（EHR）系统，该系统不依赖互联网连接，旨在提高患者安全和护理流程，并具有长期可持续性。
AI.research_question: 如何开发一种适合STMM移动诊所的EHR系统，以解决现有系统的不足？
AI.motivation: STMMs在资源有限地区提供医疗服务时，由于缺乏与现有电子健康记录系统的连接，可能导致医疗错误。目前尚未有针对STMMs的成熟EHR系统。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于对STMM诊所流程的分析和利益相关者的反馈，提出了一种去中心化的数据管理方法。
AI.method: 通过描述传统STMM诊所流程、收集历史反馈、与利益相关者讨论，设计了一种基于局域网（LAN）的P2P网络EHR系统。
AI.findings: 在东帝汶的STMM中实施该系统后，反馈显示其在诊所流程、用药安全和数据访问方面表现良好。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种适用于STMMs的去中心化EHR系统设计，填补了该领域的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发的EHR系统提高了STMMs的医疗安全性和数据管理效率，具有实际应用潜力。

title: Game-Theoretic Modeling of Economic and Tourism Policies on Public Health and Social Stability: A Multi-Outcome Optimization Study of 85 Countries
affiliations: University of West Florida and University of West Florida

detail.title: Game-Theoretic Modeling of Economic and Tourism Policies on Public Health and Social Stability: A Multi-Outcome Optimization Study of 85 Countries

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare no conflicts of interest with respect to the research, authorship, and/or publication of this article.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no specific grant from any funding agency in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors.

detail.abstract: Background: Global health outcomes are deeply influenced by macroeconomic and sociopolitical conditions. While economic growth and tourism are recognized as drivers of public welfare, their combined impact on crime, conflict, unemployment, and population health remains underexplored. This study introduces a formal game-theoretic model, applied across 85 countries, integrating GDP per capita and tourism development as strategic levers that influence five interrelated public health and stability outcomes. Methods: We constructed a multi-actor game-theoretic model using a dataset from 85 countries, with GDP per capita and tourism flows as strategies. The outcome payoffs-crime rate, war intensity, unemployment, health security, and health-adjusted life expectancy (HALE)-were modeled using linear partial-effect functions derived from global health and economic indicators. A utility-based Nash equilibrium was computed and interpreted, and findings were triangulated with literature and policy cases from diverse geopolitical contexts. Findings: The analysis reveals a dominant strategy in GDP investment and a best-response strategy in tourism development, converging at a Best Response Dominant Nash Equilibrium (BRDNE) at high levels of both GDP and tourism. This equilibrium yields the optimal utility-defined by minimized social instability and maximized health outcomes-across the 85-country sample. GDP was consistently associated with reductions in crime and conflict, while tourism enhanced health outcomes but introduced slight trade-offs in unemployment and conflict exposure. Interpretation: In the 85-country model, simultaneous optimization of GDP and tourism-when supported by labor and conflict mitigation policies-leads to the highest attainable joint benefit for public health and social stability. Gametheoretic approaches can inform multisectoral investment strategies, especially in fragile, post-conflict, or rapidly developing contexts.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过博弈论模型分析了GDP和旅游业对公共健康和社会稳定的联合影响，发现高GDP和旅游业水平能实现最优平衡。
AI.research_question: GDP和旅游业如何共同影响犯罪、冲突、失业和公共健康？
AI.motivation: 宏观经济和旅游发展对公共福利的影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 博弈论模型，纳什均衡。
AI.method: 多参与者博弈论模型，基于85国数据，线性部分效应函数。
AI.findings: 高GDP和旅游业水平实现最优平衡，GDP减少犯罪和冲突，旅游业提升健康但略增失业和冲突。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出博弈论模型分析多领域联合影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为多部门投资策略提供理论支持，尤其适用于脆弱或快速发展地区。

title: CIDO, a Community-Based Ontology for Coronavirus Disease Knowledge and Data Integration, Sharing, and Analysis
affiliations: Northwestern University, University of Michigan at Ann Arbor - University of Michigan Medical School, State University of New York and University of Michigan at Ann Arbor - Department of Computational Medicine and Bioinformatics

detail.title: CIDO, a Community-Based Ontology for Coronavirus Disease Knowledge and Data Integration, Sharing, and Analysis
detail.abstract: The Coronavirus Infectious Disease Ontology (CIDO) is a community-based ontology that supports coronavirus disease knowledge and data standardization, integration, sharing, and analysis. O ntologies, as the term is used in informatics, are structured vocabularies comprised of human-and computer-interpretable terms and relations that represent entities and relationships. Within informatics fields, ontologies play an important role in knowledge and data standardization, representation, integration, sharing and analysis. They have also become a foundation of artificial intelligence (AI) research. In what follows, we outline the Coronavirus Infectious Disease Ontology (CIDO), which covers multiple areas in the domain of coronavirus diseases, including etiology, transmission, epidemiology, pathogenesis, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment. We emphasize CIDO development relevant to COVID-19. Human coronaviruses have given rise to a series of major crises in global public health. Severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) emerged in China in November 2002, lasted for eight months and resulted in 8,098 confirmed human cases in 29 countries with 774 deaths (case-fatality rate: 9.6%) 1. Approximately ten years later in June 2012, the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS), another highly pathogenic coronavirus disease, was identified in Saudi Arabia. The MERS outbreak has caused 2,260 cases in 27 countries and 803 deaths (35.5%) 2. More recently, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) outbreak as a pandemic on March 11, 2020, when there were 118,326 confirmed cases and 4,292 deaths. As of May 13, there have been over 4.4 million confirmed cases and over 295,000 deaths globally. Unfortunately, we still do not have available effective drugs and vaccines against these highly pathological coronaviruses. Extensive studies have been conducted on coronaviruses, the results of many of which exist in publicly available data repositories such as GEO 3. Publications concerning COVID-19 have exploded in recent months, and new clinical trials have been and are being conducted to develop drugs and vaccines against COVID-19, 1,430 of which have been registered in ClinicalTrials.gov as of May 13, 2020. As of May 13, 2020, a PubMed search of "SARS", "MERS", and "SARS-CoV-2 OR COVID-19" resulted in 12,993, 4,493 and 11,813 publications, respectively. A coordinated study of all such results would likely help with understanding and developing treatments for COVID-19. This coordinated study requires the integration of the large and exponentially growing data and research concerning COVID-19 to better understand its etiology, transmission, and pathogenesis mechanism. Moreover, we must be able to translate that understanding into rapid development of patient stratification.

AI.tldr: 《冠状病毒传染病本体论（CIDO）》是一个基于社区的本体论，旨在支持冠状病毒疾病知识的标准化、集成、共享和分析。它涵盖了冠状病毒疾病的多个领域，包括病因、传播、流行病学、发病机制、诊断、预防和治疗。本文重点介绍了CIDO在COVID-19相关研究中的开发和应用。
AI.research_question: 如何通过本体论（CIDO）标准化和整合冠状病毒疾病（如COVID-19）的知识和数据，以支持研究和治疗开发？
AI.motivation: 冠状病毒（如SARS、MERS和COVID-19）对全球公共卫生构成重大威胁，但目前缺乏有效的药物和疫苗。大量相关数据和研究的快速积累需要标准化和整合工具，以加速研究和治疗开发。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本体论在信息学中用于知识表示和数据标准化，是人工智能研究的基础。CIDO基于这一理论框架，旨在为冠状病毒疾病提供结构化的词汇和关系。
AI.method: 开发和应用CIDO，涵盖冠状病毒疾病的多个领域，包括病因、传播、流行病学、发病机制、诊断、预防和治疗。
AI.findings: CIDO为冠状病毒疾病（尤其是COVID-19）的知识和数据标准化、集成与分析提供了有效工具，支持研究和治疗开发。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个专门针对冠状病毒疾病的本体论框架，丰富了知识表示和数据标准化的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: CIDO的实际应用有助于整合大量COVID-19相关数据和研究，加速对疾病的理解和治疗开发。

title: The Impact of AI on Job Automation and the Workforce
affiliations: Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune, Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune, Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune, Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune and Sinhgad Institute of Management, Pune

detail.title: The Impact of AI on Job Automation and the Workforce
detail.abstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly transforming industries by automating tasks that were once solely performed by humans. This research paper explores the multifaceted impact of AI on job automation and its subsequent influence on the global workforce. While AI increases efficiency, accuracy, and productivity, it also raises concerns about job displacement, especially in sectors involving repetitive and routine tasks. However, rather than entirely eliminating jobs, AI is reshaping them-creating demand for new skill sets and emerging roles in areas like AI development, data analysis, and robotics maintenance. This paper analyzes current trends, case studies, and statistical data to understand how organizations are adapting to these changes, and how governments and educational institutions are addressing the evolving needs of the labor market. Furthermore, the paper examines ethical and social implications, such as income inequality, digital divide, and workforce reskilling. By understanding the dual nature of AI-as both a disruptor and enabler-this study aims to present a balanced view of how AI is likely to redefine work in the coming decades.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了人工智能（AI）对工作自动化的多面影响及其对全球劳动力的后续影响。研究发现AI既提高了效率、准确性和生产力，也引发了关于工作岗位流失的担忧，尤其是在涉及重复性和常规任务的行业。然而，AI并未完全消除工作，而是重塑了它们，催生了AI开发、数据分析和机器人维护等新兴领域的需求。
AI.research_question: 人工智能如何影响工作自动化及其对全球劳动力的影响？
AI.motivation: AI的快速发展正在改变行业，但其对就业的影响尚未完全明确，需要深入研究其多面性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于技术变革对劳动力市场影响的理论，如技能偏向性技术变革（SBTC）和任务模型理论。
AI.method: 通过分析当前趋势、案例研究和统计数据，结合组织、政府和教育机构的应对策略。
AI.findings: AI既导致部分岗位流失，也创造了新兴岗位需求，同时引发收入不平等和数字鸿沟等社会问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了技术变革对劳动力市场影响的理论，特别是AI作为双重角色的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为组织、政府和教育机构提供了应对AI驱动的劳动力市场变化的策略建议。

title: Amazon Phone Reviews Analysis: Using an Econometric and Deeplearning Approach
affiliations: Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Pontificia Universidad Javeriana and Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

detail.title: Amazon Phone Reviews Analysis: Using an Econometric and Deeplearning Approach
detail.abstract: In this study, 334,328 comments on unlocked mobile phones from Amazon are analyzed, exploring descriptive statistics and constructing predictive models for rating and price using machine learning techniques, an analysis that provides information still lacking sufficient robustness in the literature. To do this, reviews were processed to generate an approximate sentiment score using the TextBlob library, related to the user's rating. In turn, simple and multiple linear regressions, and regressions including interactions, were performed to predict price, as well as multiple linear regression models to predict rating using sentiment score, price, and Review Votes (support for other users' reviews).Additionally, Multilayer Perceptron (MLP) neural network models and Transformer based models from the Hugging Face library were trained for both prediction tasks. The results show a moderate correlation between sentiment score and Rating (r≈0.554) and a significantly higher fit for rating prediction with more complex models (R2≈0.727) than with linear regression (R2≈0.308). In contrast, all approaches were poor at attempting to predict price (R2≤0.086), indicating the limited linear relationship between the available attributes  and the product's price.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了亚马逊上334,328条关于解锁手机的评论，通过机器学习技术探索描述性统计并构建评分和价格的预测模型。研究发现情感评分与评分之间存在中等相关性，复杂模型对评分预测效果更好，但对价格预测效果较差。
AI.research_question: 如何利用用户评论中的情感评分和其他特征预测解锁手机的评分和价格？
AI.motivation: 现有文献中对用户评论与产品评分及价格关系的研究缺乏足够稳健性，本研究旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于情感分析理论和机器学习预测模型。
AI.method: 使用TextBlob库生成情感评分，并采用线性回归、多层感知机（MLP）神经网络和基于Transformer的模型进行预测。
AI.findings: 情感评分与评分之间存在中等相关性（r≈0.554），复杂模型对评分预测效果更好（R2≈0.727），但对价格预测效果较差（R2≤0.086）。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了情感评分与产品评分的相关性，并展示了复杂模型在评分预测中的优势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为电商平台提供了利用用户评论预测产品评分的实用方法，但对价格预测的实用性有限。

title: Leveraging Programmable Data Plane for Network Intrusion Detection: A Survey
affiliations: University of Gloucestershire and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Leveraging Programmable Data Plane for Network Intrusion Detection: A Survey

keywords.keywords: Cyber-attack detection P4 switchmachine learning network programmable data-plane intrusion detection entropy

detail.abstract: The rapid growth of digital devices—particularly resource-constrained IoT nodes—has dramatically increased the network attack surface, introducing significant challenges for timely and effective intrusion detection. Traditional, centralized Intrusion Detection Systems (IDSs) are becoming increasingly overburdened by the sheer volume, variety, and sophistication of emerging threats. In response, recent research has turned to the programmability of the data plane in network devices such as switches, edge gateways, and smart network interface cards, enabling intrusion detection to be performed closer to the traffic source or along the forwarding path. Programmable Data Planes (PDPs) support custom packet parsing, on-the-fly header manipulation, and the extraction of packetand flow-level features, making it possible to detect and mitigate attacks at early stages without relying entirely on centralized IDSs or firewalls. This survey provides a comprehensive review of techniques that leverage PDPs for network intrusion detection, encompassing methods ranging from simple thresholding, rule-based logic, and statistical analysis to more advanced strategies involving entropy-based metrics and AI-driven inference models. It also examines how researchers have tackled the inherent limitations of programmable hardware, such as constrained memory, fixed pipeline stages, and restricted programming constructs, all while striving to maintain high detection accuracy and low latency. Finally, the survey highlights open challenges and future directions essential for evolving PDP-based intrusion detection to meet the demands of increasingly complex and dynamic network environments.

title: An Assessment of the Enforcement Mechanisms in African Data Protection Laws
affiliations: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign and University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

detail.title: An Assessment of the Enforcement Mechanisms in African Data Protection Laws

publicationDetails.detailsText: African Journal on Privacy & Data Protection, volume 2, issue 1, 2025[10.29053/ajpdp.v2i1.0002]

detail.abstract: Africa has the second-biggest population in the world, with about 1,1 billion projected internet users by 2029. This growth in internet users has made many Africans vulnerable to privacy threats. To protect their citizens' personal data, about 38 out of 55 African countries have legislated data protection laws. While previous literature has provided valuable insights into African DPLs, most studies have focused on summarising the legal framework or comparing them to other legislations like the General Data Protection Regulation. Therefore, there is a significant gap in understanding African DPL enforcement mechanisms. Our study seeks to address this gap by identifying common, unique trends and practices in African DPL enforcement. To conduct this research, we used a rigorous qualitative evaluation method of thematic content analysis involving three independent researchers. The researchers examined data protection laws of 20 African countries, which are publicly available in English, regarding their enforcement mechanisms. Our analysis indicates that all 20 countries require a dedicated data protection authority to enforce DPLs, and the laws apply to private and public sectors. To deter privacy violations, we observed that 85 per cent of the countries prescribe administrative sanctions; all the countries have provisions for financial and criminal sanctions; we also observed that 65 per cent of the countries studied allow data subjects to seek private right of action. Furthermore, all 20 countries in our sample require data controllers to register or notify data protection authorities before data processing; 55 percent of the countries have extraterritorial reach provisions. We believe our research is a critical step towards evaluating African DPLs, which will guide policymakers, international organisations, compliance analysts, lawyers, legislators and technology companies involved in data collection and processing in African nations. By comparing the enforcement approaches among different African countries, our findings can shape future regional policy and data protection practices.

AI.tldr: 本研究填补了非洲数据保护法（DPL）执行机制的空白，通过主题内容分析法分析了20个非洲国家的DPL执行机制，发现共同和独特的趋势。

title: Crime by Tech
affiliations: University of New Hampshire Franklin Pierce School of Law

detail.title: Crime by Tech
detail.abstract:
Saying “it is a crime to use a car to commit a crime” sounds redundant—and it is. American legislatures rejected this approach in the mid-20th century. Yet, American criminal codes are littered with exactly this kind of provision for other technologies. Many other states have enacted provisions separately criminalizing the use of encryption, computers, or the Internet to further criminal objectives. And artificial intelligence will soon join that list. In 2025, Utah took the first step in this direction, allowing use of generative AI in commission of a crime to count as an aggravating factor at sentencing. The Department of Justice has likewise called for the federal sentencing commission to adopt this same approach.

 

This approach is wrong. It continues American law’s fascination with punishing anew old crimes committed in new ways, from wires to guns. Separately punishing these offenses is wrong because it does not serve the purposes of criminal law, furthers the underlying pathological politics of American criminal law, and acts as a cheat code for overcriminalization. Despite worries that new technologies make deterrence of crime harder, adding additional liability for crime-by-tech serves no legitimate purpose. In criminal law, technology has politics–the politics of overcriminalization.

AI.tldr: 本文批评了美国法律中对使用新技术（如加密、计算机、互联网和人工智能）犯罪行为的重复立法现象，认为这种做法不仅多余，还助长了过度刑事化的政治倾向。

AI.method: 通过分析美国法律中的具体案例（如加密、计算机、互联网和人工智能相关立法），结合刑事法律的理论框架，论证重复立法的缺陷。
AI.findings: 重复立法不仅未能实现刑事法律的威慑目的，反而助长了过度刑事化的政治倾向，是一种无效且有害的做法。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了刑事法律中技术立法的政治化倾向及其对司法系统的负面影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 呼吁立法者避免重复立法，回归刑事法律的核心目的，减少过度刑事化的风险。

title: Is Drug-Related Violence Fueling Emigration from Central America?

detail.title: Is Drug-Related Violence Fueling Emigration from Central America?

publicationDetails.journalName: IZA Institute of Labor Economics Discussion Paper Series

detail.abstract: We study how drug-related violence affects emigration from Central America, a region with rapidly rising migration to the United States. Using multiple data sources, we apply an instrumental variables strategy based on proximity to drug-trafficking routes and coca production in Colombia. We find that violence significantly increases intentions, plans, and preparations to emigrateespecially to the U.S.with stronger effects among young and high-skilled individuals. Mediation analysis suggests this response is driven by declining economic activity and, more importantly, deteriorating labor market conditions caused by escalating violence.

title: "Hegemony by Consent: Revisiting Soft Power in a Fragmented Multipolar World"
affiliations: University of Warsaw

detail.title: "Hegemony by Consent: Revisiting Soft Power in a Fragmented Multipolar World"
detail.abstract: As global power becomes increasingly diffuse and contested, traditional paradigms of international influence rooted in military and economic dominance are being reconfigured. This article interrogates the theoretical and empirical foundations of soft power as a mechanism of global hegemony in a fragmented multipolar world. While Joseph Nye's original formulation cast soft power as the ability to attract rather than coerce, this paper argues that such attraction must be analyzed through the lens of legitimation and consent. By synthesizing neo-Gramscian conceptions of hegemony with constructivist perspectives on norm diffusion, the article re-theorizes soft power as a performative and contested strategy of governance that operates through the co-construction of legitimacy between sender and receiver. Methodologically, the study employs a qualitative comparative case analysis of China's Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) and the European Union's normative foreign policy, examining how each actor projects influence through material, institutional, and ideational channels. Drawing on data from primary policy documents, strategic narratives, and regional responses in Southeast Asia, Central Asia, Africa, and Eastern Europe, the article identifies variation in outcomes based on recipient agency, elite brokerage, and societal resonance. The findings reveal that soft power succeeds not through mere dissemination of values, but through their localization, legitimacy, and alignment with local needs. The article concludes by highlighting implications for global governance and proposes a reformulation of soft power as a hegemonic technology of consent. It offers directions for future research on digital soft power, AI diplomacy, and post-Western norm entrepreneurship.

title: The Truth Engine as a Decentralized Recursive Validation Architecture: A Bittensor Subtensor Implementation Plan
affiliations: Independent Researcher

detail.title: The Truth Engine as a Decentralized Recursive Validation Architecture: A Bittensor Subtensor Implementation Plan
detail.abstract: This paper proposes a practical implementation of The Truth Engine-a recursive epistemological architecture for validating AI-generated knowledge-within the Bittensor decentralized intelligence network. Originally conceptualized by Alexandre Lafleche Morin (2025), the Truth Engine framework positions AI, blockchain, and quantum computing as components in a logic loop: T = Q(A, B). Recognizing that scalable quantum systems are not yet available, we introduce a distributed variant, T = D(A, B), wherein decentralized Bittensor validators replace quantum evaluation with weighted peer consensus. This subtensor-based architecture enables recursive, ethics-aware truth adjudication by integrating AI generation, on-chain constraints, and distributed logic arbitration. The result is a forward-compatible design that operationalizes the Truth Engine today-bridging theory and infrastructure in the pursuit of verifiable, context-aware digital cognition.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种在Bittensor去中心化网络中实现Truth Engine的实用方法，通过分布式验证器替代量子计算，实现递归、伦理感知的知识验证。

AI.theoretical_framework: Truth Engine框架（T = Q(A, B)）及其分布式变体（T = D(A, B)）。
AI.method: 基于Bittensor网络的分布式验证器，通过加权共识机制替代量子评估。
AI.findings: 设计了一种兼容未来的架构，结合AI生成、链上约束和分布式逻辑仲裁。

title: Quantum Choice Framed As Transaction Cost
affiliations: Agricultural University -Plovdiv

detail.title: Quantum Choice Framed As Transaction Cost

declarations.declarationOfInterest: There is no conflict of interest.
declarations.funderStatement: The research was carried out entirely with the author's personal funds.

detail.abstract: This study introduces a novel theoretical framework-Quantum Choice as Transactional Cost (QTC) to reconceptualize decision-making under uncertainty. Drawing from quantum cognition, bounded rationality, and institutional economics, the model treats choice as a probabilistic, observer-dependent process shaped by both internal conviction and external institutional pressures. Unlike classical models that assume linear rationality and fixed costs, QTC frames decision-making as a dynamic superposition of behavioral states, where agents "collapse" into action based on cognitive, procedural, and normative constraints. Using a quantum-inspired simulation, the study demonstrates that even agents with strong internal motivation may fail to adopt sustainable behavior when behavioral barriers are high-unless a form of "quantum tunneling" occurs. The model integrates methods such as Discrete Structural Analysis, Cognitive-Institutional Analysis, and Transactional Entropy Mapping to measure the psycho-informational costs of decision-making. By capturing the recursive interplay between individual cognition and institutional structure, QTC offers a powerful lens for analyzing complex, uncertain, and socially embedded choices.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种新的理论框架——量子选择作为交易成本（QTC），重新定义了不确定性下的决策过程。结合量子认知、有限理性和制度经济学，该模型将选择视为一个概率性、观察者依赖的过程，受内部信念和外部制度压力的共同影响。通过量子启发模拟，研究发现即使具有强烈内部动机的个体也可能因行为障碍而无法采取可持续行为，除非发生“量子隧穿”。

title: Granular Markups and Inflation Surge: The Role of Managerial Incentives
affiliations: University of Minnesota - Twin Cities - Carlson School of Management, University of Illinois Urbana Champaign, Indiana University - Kelley School of Business and University of Minnesota Twin Cities

detail.title: Granular Markups and Inflation Surge: The Role of Managerial Incentives

publicationDetails.detailsText: Kilts Center at Chicago Booth Marketing Data Center Paper
publicationDetails.journalName: Kilts Center at Chicago Booth Marketing Data Center Paper Series

detail.abstract: We develop a novel methodology to estimate firm-specific markup premiums using highly granular product-level data that controls for common shocks, isolating the premium as a residual. We validate this measure by comparing it to existing accountingbased estimates and by showing that it exhibits expected correlations with firm size and market share. Unlike traditional approaches, our method can be applied to both public and private firms, enabling an analysis of how financial structure and managerial incentives influence pricing decisions. We find that financial structure matters: public firms systematically increase markups following an IPO. Moreover, during the 2021-2022 inflation surge, publicly listed firms expanded their margins by capitalizing on inflationary pressures-especially among firms with high retail ownership, large early-pandemic stock declines, and strong equity-based pay incentives.

title: Why Avoiding Deindustrialization via Subsidies May Trigger a Subsidy Trap and Slow Down Green Investments
affiliations: University of Münster, WHU - Otto Beisheim School of Management and University of Düsseldorf - Düsseldorf Institute for Competition Economics (DICE)

detail.title: Why Avoiding Deindustrialization via Subsidies May Trigger a Subsidy Trap and Slow Down Green Investments
detail.abstract: To counter the threat of deindustrialization due to soaring energy prices and facilitate a green transition, policymakers have devised new subsidy schemes such as the “bridge electricity price” (BEP). To analyze this, we develop a model, where the principal introduces a subsidy program to prevent the agent from exiting and facilitate green investments, which would end the agent’s reliance on the subsidy. We demonstrate that, while successfully mitigating deindustrialization, the subsidy can lead to unintended consequences. First, the principal’s commitment problem can lower investment incentives and lead to the subsidy program being everlasting. Second, it can induce a “subsidy trap”, drawing non-targeted agents into the subsidy scheme. Lastly, it can reinforce the exit problem it intended to solve by encouraging opportunistic investments. When applying our results to the BEP, we conclude that the fiscal costs of this subsidy could, therefore, far exceed initial projections.

detail.title: Biophysical Climate Mitigation Potential of Coniferous Forests in Temperate Ecosystems of South Tyrol
detail.abstract: Forests affect climate parameters through impacts from biochemical and biophysical processes. However, the effects of the coniferous stands on hydrological setting in temperate regions have received little attention. This study investigated impacts of forest with different ages on water balance. The dominated species include spruce (Picea abies L.), Swiss stone pine (Pinus cembra L.) and Scots pine (Pinus sylvestris L.). During fieldwork campaign, data were collected on temperature, radiance, precipitation, evapotranspiration, throughfall, humidity and vapour pressure deficit. Data modelling reveals the relationship between the characteristics of forests (tree age, height and canopy structure) and meteorological parameters on water balance. This study supports silviculture, forest management and sustainability of Alpine environment in North Italy.

detail.abstract: COVID-19 pandemic has profoundly disrupted global quality of life, economic stability, and sustainable development. Decent Work Agenda of International Labour Organization's (ILO), aligned with United Nations' Agenda 2030 and 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), emphasize creating productive employment, safeguarding workplace rights, and fostering social protection. These frameworks highlight potential of sustainable strategies to create jobs, unlock economic benefits, and build resilience through investments in human capital. Despite this, unsafe work environments persist, with ILO estimating millions of deaths and injuries annually from work-related conditions. Such challenges underscore critical need to prioritize employee mental, spiritual well-being, purposedriven workplaces, decent work agenda, values, well-being, economic growth and sustainability. As a cornerstone of sustainable growth. Most existing research on sustainability predominantly focuses on consumer-facing business strategies, with limited emphasis in workplace context, particularly on employee well-being. This paper examines intersection of decent work, economic growth, and sustainability, exploring how organisations can integrate employee health into their sustainability agendas. By aligning with Decent Work Agenda, this paper offers actionable insights for building resilient, agile workforces, positioning organizations to achieve sustainable economic growth while addressing the evolving expectations of employees and investors.

detail.abstract: Successive technological revolutions have promised worker liberation yet delivered intensified labor demands. Artificial intelligence now poses a similar risk of entrenching managerial surveillance and widening inequality. This paper argues that the only ethical deployment of AI in the workplace is one in which employees may use the technology without being compelled to admit or defend that use. Situating AI within a deliberately protected gray zone-analogous to the uninvestigated taking of sick leave-preserves worker autonomy, disrupts power asymmetries, and forestalls the appropriation of technological gains by capital. Grounded in Kantian autonomy, Žižek's theory of fetishistic disavowal, and contemporary empirical research, the paper outlines historical patterns of visibility-driven exploitation, presents criteria for justified non-disclosure, anticipates objections, and proposes policy pathways for institutionalizing "tool-based ambiguity." The argument concludes that shielding AI use from compulsory transparency is an ethical imperative for a just future of work.

detail.abstract: The retail industry has undergone significant transformation with the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) technologies. This study presents a comprehensive analysis of AI-powered forecasting models for retail operations, focusing on demand planning, customer behavior analysis, and supply chain optimization. Through the implementation of advanced predictive algorithms including Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, Random Forest, and XG Boost models, we demonstrate significant improvements in forecasting accuracy. Our findings reveal that AI-driven approaches achieve 23% better accuracy in demand forecasting, 31% improvement in customer behavior prediction, and 28% enhancement in supply chain optimization compared to traditional methods. The study utilizes real-world retail data from multiple sources to validate the effectiveness of these predictive intelligence systems. Results indicate that integrated AI solutions can reduce inventory costs by 15-20% while improving customer satisfaction scores by 18%. This research contributes to the growing body of knowledge on AI applications in retail and provides practical insights for industry practitioners.

detail.title: Are Citizens Willing to Reduce Public Debt? Beliefs, Information and Policy Preferences
detail.abstract: This paper investigates how raising awareness of public debt sustainability affects individual attitudes toward debt reduction and fiscal policy preferences. Using a survey experiment on a representative sample of the Italian population, we randomly assign objective information about government debt to citizens, who become more sensitive to the risks of tax increases, spending cuts, and imbalances for future generations. We find no effect on the perception of debt reduction as an urgent policy priority. While remaining highly averse to any tax increase, treated respondents support spending cuts (but not in education and health care) as a policy to reduce the debt burden. We also show that subjects with distorted beliefs about government debt are no more responsive to the information treatment than subjects with correct beliefs, shedding light on the challenges of building a voting majority for debt-stabilizing policies.

title: Seizing Growth Opportunities, a Risky Business? Effects of Cloud-Sourcing on Mergers and Acquisitions

detail.title: Seizing Growth Opportunities, a Risky Business? Effects of Cloud-Sourcing on Mergers and Acquisitions

publicationDetails.detailsText: Paper has been "accepted" for publication in MIS Quarterly

detail.abstract:
Recent research has shown that enterprise information technology (IT) can drive strategic growth through mergers and acquisitions (M&As). An implicit assumption underlying this research is that firms own their IT infrastructure. Challenging this assumption, however, the emerging trend of cloud-sourcing suggests that IT may be owned by third-party vendors. Since third-party ownership of IT can introduce significant transaction costs and operational inefficiencies cloud-sourcing, unlike in-house enterprise IT, can be considered unlikely to drive M&A growth. However, the unique combination of IT infrastructural and service flexibilities that cloud-sourcing provides could help in reducing the risk of integration failure posed by M&As, thereby driving M&A growth. Grounded in the transaction cost economics (TCE) and resource-based views (RBV) of the firm respectively, these arguments illustrate the conflicting theoretical viewpoints offered by prior literature. This study attempts to improve our theoretical understanding of the relationship between cloud-sourcing and M&A growth by addressing the theoretical conflict.

Analyzing a dataset of cloud-sourcing deals and M&As comprising 4,075 observations from 673 firms, our research finds cloud-sourcing to have a positive impact on the intensity and value of M&As pursued. Consistent with our theoretical proposition that these positive effects arise from the reduced risk of M&A integration failure afforded by cloud flexibilities, this research finds the effects to be driven by cloud services that are more standardized (i.e., Software-as-as-Service, public and globalized clouds) and adopted in informate rather than automate or transformate industries. Support for the theoretical proposition is further established through interviews with industry experts, and mechanism tests which reveal that cloud-sourcing particularly drives M&As requiring intensive integration (i.e. operational versus financial M&As) and is associated with reduced disclosure of M&A risks in annual reports. Finally, consistent with our view that cloud souring smoothens post-M&A integration, this research also finds firms with cloud-sourcing to have relatively stronger post-M&A performance.

title: The Impact of Brand Equity on Vertical Integration in Franchise Systems
