title: Artificial Intelligence in the Digital Economy: Multilateral and Regional Legal Challenges from the Perspective of the Indo-Pacific
affiliations: University of Macau - Faculty of Law

detail.title: Artificial Intelligence in the Digital Economy: Multilateral and Regional Legal Challenges from the Perspective of the Indo-Pacific
detail.abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) currently dominates the global regulatory discourse. Several jurisdictions have already adopted or are preparing regulations to meet the challenges of the rise of AI in the global digital economy. The Indo-Pacific region has emerged as a potential epicentre of the future digital economy; however, to achieve this goal, it must attempt to create a coherent regulatory framework for digital technologies. If successful, the Indo-Pacific region can also make an important legal contribution to the future global AI governance framework, as the present multilateral framework at the global level established by the United Nations and World Trade Organization (WTO) system was created before the digital era, is fragmented and therefore inadequate to meet the legal challenges posed by AI. Critically sketching out the narrative of the global AI debate, the article exemplifies the main regulatory challenges posed by the distinct technological features of AI and its future evolutions. The article concludes that meeting these challenges will require a new mind-set to set up a regulatory framework capable of meeting the complex problems caused by the cross-cutting nature of AI and related technologies as well as the disruptive effects they exert on the economy, society and individual lives.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了人工智能（AI）在全球监管讨论中的主导地位，指出印太地区作为未来数字经济的潜在中心，需建立统一的数字技术监管框架，以应对AI带来的法律挑战。
AI.research_question: 印太地区如何建立一个连贯的数字技术监管框架，以应对AI带来的全球法律挑战？
AI.motivation: 当前全球多边框架（如联合国和WTO体系）在数字时代前建立，无法有效应对AI的法律挑战，印太地区有机会通过建立新框架为全球AI治理做出贡献。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于全球治理理论和数字技术监管理论，分析AI的独特技术特征及其对经济、社会和个人的影响。
AI.method: 通过批判性分析全球AI监管讨论和印太地区的潜力，提出建立新监管框架的必要性。
AI.findings: 印太地区需采用新思维建立监管框架，以应对AI的跨领域性和颠覆性影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 为全球AI治理提供了新的理论视角，强调印太地区在制定未来监管框架中的关键作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了建立AI监管框架的具体建议，以促进数字经济的发展和全球治理的改进。

title: The Global Institutional Governance of AI: A Four-Dimensional Perspective
affiliations: University of Macau - Faculty of Law

detail.title: The Global Institutional Governance of AI: A Four-Dimensional Perspective
detail.abstract: The present debate about the governance of artificial intelligence (AI) is dominated by a narrative of a "global race toward the regulation of AI." Such a narrative bears serious dangers and should be rephrased as the "race toward the global regulation of AI" to adequately address the cross-cutting, cross-boundary, and cross-cultural nature of these technologies. If the debate about the future regulation of AI is to efficiently address the serious dangers and potentially existential risks related to AI, then it should be tied to other global governance issues, such as those summarized by the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). For this endeavor to be successful, the substantive questions of regulation must be combined with efforts to reform the present international system with a view to establishing a more efficient and coherent global institutional framework. It is important to be mindful of past obstacles in the reform of existing international organizations and to avoid the need for another global cataclysm to trigger institutional reform; thus, the article follows the idea that cognitive change leads to the transformation of international organizations. As both a technology aimed to replicate the human mind and an example of an important linguistic trend of a rise in essentially oxymoronic concepts, AI is deemed to provide the right point of departure to ponder future modes of human cognitionmodes that reflect Einstein's description of a world as a "four-dimensional spacetime continuum,"which may help to imagine the contours of a future global institutional framework.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了人工智能（AI）治理的全球叙事，建议将其从“全球AI监管竞赛”重新表述为“全球AI监管的竞赛”，以更好地应对AI的跨领域、跨国界和跨文化特性。文章主张将AI监管与其他全球治理问题（如联合国可持续发展目标）结合，并推动国际体系改革以建立更高效的全球制度框架。

AI.motivation: 当前AI治理的叙事存在局限性，未能充分反映AI的跨领域特性，且可能忽视其潜在风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 文章基于认知变革理论，认为国际组织的转型需要认知变化，而AI作为模拟人类思维的技术，可能成为推动这种变革的起点。
AI.method: 通过理论分析和案例研究，探讨AI治理的全球叙事及其与国际治理体系的关联。
AI.findings: 重新定义AI治理叙事并结合全球治理目标，有助于建立更高效的全球制度框架。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了认知变革理论在AI治理中的应用，为国际组织转型提供新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了将AI监管与全球治理目标结合的具体路径，推动国际体系改革。

title: The Impact of Climate Factors on Inflation in the Service Sector of European Regions: A Dynamic Panel Analysis
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: The Impact of Climate Factors on Inflation in the Service Sector of European Regions: A Dynamic Panel Analysis
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the impact of climatic factors on inflation in the services sector across European regions, using a dynamic panel model estimated via System GMM. The dataset comprises quarterly observations for 12 European countries between 2003 and 2023, grouped into Northern, Central, and Southern regions. Climatic variables include mean air temperature, cooling and heating degree days, and the log-transformed price of Russian gas. Macroeconomic controls, GDP growth and fiscal balance, are incorporated to account for structural conditions. Empirical findings show that climatic factors and their regional interactions are not statistically significant determinants of services inflation. However, gas prices exert a strong inflationary effect, and inflation persistence is evident. Diagnostic tests confirm the model’s validity, addressing endogeneity, heteroskedasticity, and instrument proliferation. The main contribution of this study lies in applying a robust dynamic panel framework to assess climate-inflation linkages in the under-researched services sector, highlighting the role of energy channels over direct climatic effects. By integrating regional heterogeneity and methodological rigor, the paper advances understanding of how climate variability translates into inflationary pressures within service-based economies.​

detail.abstract: Beneficial ownership is a prominent method of attribution used today, applied in situations where it is necessary to connect an asset to a person for various purposes across different areas of law such as equity and trusts, tax, property, and anti-money laundering. Much has been written about the concept in tax law in modern times, though perhaps less about the historical origins and development of the concept. This chapter seeks to fill a gap in the literature discussing the history of the concept, utilising as its primary method of analysis the study of historical statutes and how they evolved over time. It starts with the modern conception of beneficial ownership as a concept inextricable from the law of equity, with its core being the idea that a person has a legal duty to hold assets for the benefit of another (to the exclusion of its own benefit).

title: A Strict Test for Economic Reality- the Concept of Vat Supply in Airtours

detail.title: A Strict Test for Economic Reality- the Concept of Vat Supply in Airtours

publicationDetails.detailsText: International VAT Monitor, volume 35, issue 1, 2023[10.59403/2k61ygh]

detail.abstract: In this article, the author discusses the UK Supreme Court decision in the Airtours case and the two-step test done by Judge Lord Neuberger focusing on identifying a contractual obligation to make a supply to the payor and only departing from this requirement if it would be in accordance with “economic reality”. The author submits that contract law can serve as a starting point, but that the focus on the existence of a contractual obligation in Airtours makes the test excessively restrictive. In the author’s view, “economic reality” in a multiple-party situation should not require the taxable person to prove “artificiality” or “sham”; and contract law and the contractual terms should not serve as a “strait-jacket” for VAT law.

AI.tldr: 本文讨论了英国最高法院在Airtours案件中的判决，重点关注法官Lord Neuberger的两步测试法，即识别对付款方的合同义务，并仅在符合“经济现实”时偏离此要求。作者认为合同法可以作为起点，但Airtours案中对合同义务存在的关注使测试过于严格。作者主张在多党情况下，“经济现实”不应要求纳税人证明“人为性”或“虚假性”，合同法也不应成为增值税法的“束缚”。
AI.research_question: 在英国最高法院Airtours案中，合同义务的识别和“经济现实”的考量如何影响增值税法的适用？
AI.motivation: 探讨合同法和增值税法之间的关系，特别是在多党情况下如何平衡合同义务与经济现实的考量。
AI.theoretical_framework: 合同法与增值税法的交叉分析，重点关注“经济现实”在税务判定中的作用。
AI.method: 通过分析Airtours案的判决和Lord Neuberger的两步测试法，探讨其法律和经济影响。
AI.findings: Airtours案中对合同义务的严格关注可能使增值税法的适用过于受限，而“经济现实”的考量应更灵活。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出在多党情况下，增值税法应更注重经济实质而非合同形式，减少对合同法的依赖。
AI.practical_contributions: 为税务实践提供建议，避免合同法的过度限制，更灵活地适用增值税法。

title: Power Hungry: How Ai Will Drive Energy Demand
affiliations: International Monetary Fund (IMF), affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, International Monetary Fund (IMF), International Monetary Fund (IMF) and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Power Hungry: How Ai Will Drive Energy Demand
detail.abstract: The development and deployment of large language models like ChatGPT across the world requires expanding data centers that consume substantial amounts of electricity. Using descriptive statistics and a multi-country computable general equilibrium model (IMF-ENV), we examine how AI-driven data center growth affects electricity consumption, electricity prices, and carbon emissions. Our analysis of national accounts reveals AI-producing sectors in the U.S. have grown nearly triple the rate of the private non-farm business sector, with firm-level evidence showing electricity costs for vertically integrated AI companies nearly doubled between 2019-2023. Simulating AI scenarios in the IMF-ENV model based on projected data center power consumption up to 2030, we find the AI boom will cause manageable but varying increases in energy prices and emissions depending on policies and infrastructure constraints. Under scenarios with constrained growth in renewable energy capacity and limited expansion of transmission infrastructure, U.S. electricity prices could increase by 8.6%, while U.S. and global carbon emissions would rise by 5.5% and 1.2% respectively under current policies. Our findings highlight the importance of aligning energy policies with AI development to support this technological revolution, while mitigating environmental impacts.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了AI驱动的数据中心增长对电力消耗、电价和碳排放的影响，发现其影响因政策和基础设施而异，并强调了能源政策与AI发展对齐的重要性。
AI.research_question: AI驱动的数据中心增长如何影响电力消耗、电价和碳排放？
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（如ChatGPT）的开发和部署需要扩展数据中心，消耗大量电力，因此研究其对能源和环境的影响至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 使用描述性统计和多国可计算一般均衡模型（IMF-ENV）分析数据中心的电力需求和环境影响。
AI.method: 结合国家账户分析和IMF-ENV模型模拟，评估AI驱动的数据中心增长对电力市场和碳排放的影响。
AI.findings: AI驱动的数据中心增长导致电价和碳排放上升，具体幅度取决于政策和基础设施。例如，美国电价可能上涨8.6%，碳排放增加5.5%。
AI.theory_contributions: 为AI发展与能源政策的关系提供了理论框架和分析工具。
AI.practical_contributions: 强调了能源政策与AI发展对齐的必要性，以支持技术革命并减少环境影响。

title: The Iberian Exception: What Was the Cost of Distorting Electricity Markets During the 2021-23 European Energy Crisis?
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Judge Business School, University of Oxford - Oxford Institute for Energy Studies and University of Oxford - Oxford Institute for Energy Studies

detail.title: The Iberian Exception: What Was the Cost of Distorting Electricity Markets During the 2021-23 European Energy Crisis?
detail.abstract: European wholesale power prices increased to an unprecedented level during the energy crisis in 2022. To tackle the adverse impact on consumers, Spain and Portugal implemented the Iberian Exception (IE) in June 2022, intending to decouple power prices from the rest of Europe to reduce consumer energy bills. Our findings suggested that IE successfully lowered the fossil fuel bids in the Iberian power market with a secondary effect of decoupling the Spanish power markets from France. We simulated the counterfactual scenario by investigating wholesale electricity prices without the subsidy paid to gas generators. Our demand and supply adjustment scenario shows that the subsidy reduced Iberian electricity day-ahead prices by 35.3%. The model was further used to compare the gas-fired generation between June 2022 and February 2023, when the gas price was above the gas cap. Depending on the scenarios, IE increased the Iberian gas burnt by 19.2%; On the EU level, gas burnt also increased by 1.3%. The total Iberian foreign demand also increased gas for power burnt by +5.47% in Iberia (+0.81% across the EU), relative to the effect in the absence of interconnection.

AI.tldr: 西班牙和葡萄牙在2022年能源危机期间实施“伊比利亚例外”（IE）政策，成功降低电力市场化石燃料报价，并部分实现与欧洲其他地区的电价脱钩。研究发现，补贴使伊比利亚日前电价降低35.3%，但增加了天然气发电量。
AI.research_question: “伊比利亚例外”政策对电力市场和天然气消费的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 2022年欧洲能源危机导致电价飙升，西班牙和葡萄牙实施IE政策以缓解消费者负担，但其实际效果需评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 电力市场定价机制、政策干预对能源市场的影响、供需调整模型。
AI.method: 通过模拟反事实情景（无补贴）分析电价变化，并比较不同情景下的天然气发电量。
AI.findings: IE政策使伊比利亚日前电价降低35.3%，但增加了天然气发电量（伊比利亚+19.2%，欧盟+1.3%）。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了政策干预对电力市场定价和能源消费的直接影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为类似能源危机下的政策制定提供实证依据，需权衡电价降低与能源消费增加的利弊。

detail.abstract: The first edition of this chapter was divided into three main parts: (a) international tax law; (b) domestic tax law; and (c) tax and regulation. This second edition updates each of these parts and adds two new areas for discussion: (d) taxation of crypto assets; and (e) taxation and generative artificial intelligence (“AI”). In line with the intention that this chapter (and, more generally, the book) be used as a primer, leading publications for each of these areas will be referenced, for readers to do further reading if they so wish.

detail.abstract: This Article criticizes the reasoning of the European Commission and EU courts in the Apple state aid case and proposes reforms to avoid similar failures in future tax state aid enforcement. Building on a companion article that traced the litigation, this piece argues that the Commission applied an invented, retroactive allocation method unsupported by Irish law or binding international standards. It identifies serious procedural and substantive defects, including the Commission’s use of non-binding OECD guidance developed after the contested rulings, inconsistent legal theories, and disregard for evidence about where Apple’s intellectual property was actually controlled. The Article criticizes the General Court for adopting new arguments not raised in the Commission’s Final Decision and for relying on superficial similarities between Irish law and the OECD’s Authorized OECD Approach (AOA) to justify using external standards. It also criticizes the Court of Justice for failing to discipline the overreach of the Commission and General Court.  By relying on a dubious procedural technicality, the Court reinstated the Commission’s recovery order despite prior decisions (Fiat, Amazon, Engie) that should have compelled rejection. Arguing that the Apple decision undermines Member State tax sovereignty, legal predictability, and the rule of law, the Article recommends reforms to improve procedural transparency, constrain retroactive enforcement, and restore coherence to EU state aid doctrine in tax cases. Such reforms are needed if state aid enforcement in the tax area is to serve as a legitimate constraint on Member State tax sovereignty.

AI.findings: 欧盟委员会使用了虚构的追溯性分配方法，法院则依赖非约束性OECD指南和程序性技术细节，导致执法不公。

detail.abstract: Using communities to grow a marketing business can be an effective strategy, especially after the pandemic, when a feeling of community has surpassed environmental concerns. Gaining new buyers, increasing brand loyalty, gaining valuable insights and feedback, and, most importantly, becoming a more meaningful brand by doing good in society is essential for any marketing business entity or brand while pursuing success. The walk, not just the talk, is a fantastic approach to delivering meaning. While many brands are frantically trying to check all of the eco boxes, the truth is that people inspire people. The stuff that makes an emotional impact is human to human, from community to Fair-trade. We have tried to look at the three stakeholders with whom a marketing business entity should try to maintain a good engagement with - Buyers, Shareholders and Community. We have attempted to figure out why arrangements with these stakeholders are essential for marketing business and how marketing businesses can improve their communication and engagement with all three stakeholders. We have also tried to gather inferences and leverage such engagement.

title: Not All Temperature Shocks are Alike: Disentangling Climate and Weather Shocks and Their Effects on Inflation in Australia
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Economics Discipline Group, University of Technology Sydney

detail.title: Not All Temperature Shocks are Alike: Disentangling Climate and Weather Shocks and Their Effects on Inflation in Australia
detail.abstract: We study the effects of weather and climate shocks on inflation in Australia using monthly, state-level temperature anomaly data. Our analysis proceeds in two stages. In the first stage, we decompose temperature shocks into transitory (weather) and persistent (climate) components using a structural vector autoregression model with long-run restrictions. We justify the identification restriction by establishing its equivalence to a spectral projection operator from a linearized singularly perturbed system, formally linking the decomposition to timescale separation in climate science. In the second stage, we estimate the dynamic effects of these shocks on inflation using smooth local projections. We find that both weather and climate shocks significantly influence inflation, with heterogeneous effects across categories, states, and seasons, highlighting the macroeconomic importance of distinct modes of climate variability.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了澳大利亚天气和气候冲击对通货膨胀的影响，通过两阶段分析发现，短期和长期气候冲击均显著影响通胀，且效果因类别、地区和季节而异。
AI.research_question: 澳大利亚的天气和气候冲击如何影响通货膨胀？
AI.motivation: 探讨气候变化的宏观经济影响，特别是对通货膨胀的异质性效应。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于结构向量自回归模型（SVAR）和谱投影算子理论，将温度冲击分解为短期（天气）和长期（气候）成分。
AI.method: 两阶段分析：1. 使用SVAR模型分解温度冲击；2. 使用平滑局部投影法估计冲击对通胀的动态影响。
AI.findings: 天气和气候冲击均显著影响通胀，效果因类别、地区和季节而异。
AI.theory_contributions: 将气候科学中的时间尺度分离理论引入经济学，为气候冲击的分解提供新方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了气候冲击对通胀影响的实证依据，有助于制定针对性政策。

title: Green Fiscal Consolidation and the Optimal Spending-Tax Mix
affiliations: University of Cyprus, European Central Bank (ECB) and European Commission - Joint Research Centre (Seville)

detail.title: Green Fiscal Consolidation and the Optimal Spending-Tax Mix
detail.abstract: This paper studies the macroeconomic and environmental effects of public debt consolidation in the presence of climate change. We develop a New Keynesian DSGE model with climate externalities, disaggregated energy sectors, and differentiated pub- lic investment in green and dirty capital. The economy transitions from a high (90%) to a lower (75%) public debt-to-GDP ratio under two regimes: ad hoc fiscal rules and e optimized state-contingent policies following Schmitt-Grohe ́ and Uribe (2007). We analyze each regime with and without climate-related productivity effects. Our find- ings show that long-run output and welfare gains from consolidation depend on the fiscal instrument used. Capital tax reductions yield the highest gains, while green pub- lic investment fosters clean energy with minimal fossil fuel use. During transition, carbon tax-based consolidation has milder short-run costs and stronger medium-run gains when climate damages are considered. Optimized policy mixes—including car- bon taxes and spending cuts—enhance debt sustainability and the green transition, especially when climate externalities are internalized.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在气候变化背景下公共债务整合的宏观经济和环境效应，通过构建新凯恩斯DSGE模型，分析了两种财政制度下的债务整合效果，发现长期产出和福利收益取决于财政工具的选择。
AI.research_question: 气候变化背景下，公共债务整合对宏观经济和环境的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨公共债务整合在气候变化背景下的作用，为政策制定提供理论支持。
AI.theoretical_framework: 新凯恩斯DSGE模型，包含气候外部性、分部门能源市场和公共投资差异化。
AI.method: 构建模型，分析两种财政制度（临时财政规则和优化状态依赖政策）下的债务整合效果。
AI.findings: 长期产出和福利收益取决于财政工具；资本税减免收益最高，绿色公共投资促进清洁能源；碳税整合短期成本较低，中期收益显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了DSGE模型在气候政策分析中的应用，提出了优化政策组合的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了债务整合和绿色转型的政策建议，尤其是碳税和支出削减的组合。

title: A Logarithm Surplus-Consumption Ratio
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Institue for Financial and Accounting Studies, Xiamen University

detail.title: A Logarithm Surplus-Consumption Ratio
detail.abstract: We introduce a logarithm surplus-consumption ratio in the habit sensitivity function that robustly matches observed equity premium variability in exchange, production, and lumpy economies through low effective risk aversion. Empirically, our artificial surplus consumption from aggregate consumption is high and yields small effective risk aversion. Yet, our generalized method of moments estimates suggest that the stochastic discount factor curvature is high, implying that effective risk aversion in the traditional habit sensitivity specification is implausibly high. Taking a logarithm for the surplus consumption ratio in the habit sensitivity function can resolve this inconsistency and preserve empirically plausible levels of risk aversion. Separating the stochastic discount factor curvature from its typical linear correspondence with effective risk aversion is essential in our theoretical specification. Using our specification, we replicate numerous quantitative asset pricing moments in exchange and production economies and improve pricing performance in lumpy economies while maintaining low effective risk aversion.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种对数剩余消费比率的习惯敏感性函数，通过低有效风险厌恶稳健地匹配观察到的股权溢价变异性。实证表明，该方法在保持低风险厌恶的同时，解决了传统习惯敏感性函数中风险厌恶过高的问题。
AI.research_question: 如何在保持低有效风险厌恶的同时，匹配股权溢价的变异性？
AI.motivation: 传统习惯敏感性函数中风险厌恶过高，与实证数据不符，需要一种新的理论框架来解决这一矛盾。
AI.theoretical_framework: 对数剩余消费比率的习惯敏感性函数，分离了随机贴现因子曲率与有效风险厌恶的线性对应关系。
AI.method: 广义矩估计法（GMM）用于估计随机贴现因子曲率和有效风险厌恶。
AI.findings: 对数剩余消费比率能解决传统习惯敏感性函数中风险厌恶过高的问题，并在多种经济模型中匹配资产定价矩。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的习惯敏感性函数，分离了随机贴现因子曲率与有效风险厌恶的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 改进资产定价模型在多种经济环境中的表现，同时保持低有效风险厌恶。

title: Lessons from the History of Wi-Fi for Policymakers
affiliations: High Tech Forum

detail.title: Lessons from the History of Wi-Fi for Policymakers

publicationDetails.detailsText: TPRC 53: The Research Conference on Communications Information and Internet Policy

detail.abstract:
Single-station performance under real-world conditions is the most significant benchmark for assessing network capacity because it sets the baseline for assessment in all other testing scenarios. This study measures single station throughput on Wi-Fi networks following IEEE Standards Association 802.11 standards from 802.11a to 802.11be. Its principal objective is to disentangle performance improvements enabled by wider channels from those driven by technology improvements in the Wi-Fi protocols. It contrasts resource consumption with resource consumption efficiency.

The Wireless Broadband Alliance is following this line of research in a series of Wi-Fi 7 Trials in residential and enterprise settings.

Testing reveals that the most impactful upgrade took place when 802.11n supplanted 802.11a and 802.11g. 802.11n (also known as Wi-Fi 4) doubled channel size from 20 to 40 MHz while increasing throughput by eight times. While wider channels helped, other factors proved more significant in enabling pleasing user experience. Subsequent revisions have relied almost exclusively on increasing channel size with modest improvements in the protocols.

While some amended standards managed to improve performance through a combination of spectrum and efficiency – such as 802.11ac (Wi-Fi 5), others have been much less impactful. One amendment – 6 GHz 802.11ax (Wi-Fi 6e) actually eroded download performance in most scenarios even when improving upload performance. The most recent amendment – 802.11be (Wi-Fi 7) – is quite effective at improving performance in short-distance and long-distance scenarios, but harmful at the most commonly used middle distance of 25 feet except when supplemented by Automatic Frequency Control (AFC). While Wi-Fi 7 includes a host of protocol improvements, few products implement all of them.

Policy makers would be wise to consider the tradeoff between finite spectrum resources and the effectively infinite supply of potential design improvements in the engineering pipeline when responding to requests for more spectrum. Grants of free, unlicensed spectrum represent part of an implicit bargain between government and industry: The government waives license fees in exchange for industry making advances in wireless network technology. If the advances don’t materialize, the bargain must be renegotiated.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过测量Wi-Fi网络中单站性能，分析了从802.11a到802.11be标准的技术改进与信道宽度对性能的影响，发现802.11n是最具影响力的升级，而后续标准主要依赖信道扩展。Wi-Fi 7在短距离和长距离场景中表现优异，但在中距离场景中需依赖AFC。研究建议政策制定者在频谱分配时权衡资源与技术进步。
AI.research_question: Wi-Fi协议从802.11a到802.11be的技术改进与信道宽度扩展对单站性能的影响如何？
AI.motivation: 评估单站性能是网络容量评估的基础，本研究旨在区分技术改进与信道宽度对性能的贡献。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于IEEE 802.11标准，分析Wi-Fi协议的技术演进与信道宽度扩展对性能的影响。
AI.method: 通过实际测试测量不同Wi-Fi标准下单站的吞吐量，对比资源消耗与效率。
AI.findings: 802.11n是最具影响力的升级，后续标准主要依赖信道扩展；Wi-Fi 7在短/长距离表现优异，但中距离需AFC支持。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了技术改进与信道扩展对性能的相对贡献，为Wi-Fi技术演进提供理论依据。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供频谱分配与技术改进的权衡建议，推动行业技术进步。

title: Portfolio Selection Under Rational Inattention with Varying Interest Rates
affiliations: Lehigh University - College of Business and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Portfolio Selection Under Rational Inattention with Varying Interest Rates
detail.abstract: We extend Huang and Liu’s (2007) framework by introducing a stochastic interest rate to examine utility gains from optimal signal precision under rational inattention (RI). A RI investor can attain higher expected terminal utility under rate fluctuations when signal accuracy and portfolio allocation are jointly optimized, compared to a constant-rate benchmark. Notably, a preference for a short-term bond does not necessarily imply investment, as actual allocation depends on the asset mix.As fluctuation rises, investors shift from economizing on information to sharpening precision for timely, informed responses. Retaining static signal choice at time zero and dynamic portfolio planning, our model explains the emergence of corner solutions—full attention to either rate or market signals—whenever the marginal utility of a hidden state exceeds its acquisition cost.Replacing the constant rate in the baseline model with a trend-based estimate yields convergence in value functions. Given the tension between economic growth and price stability, interest rate trend uncertainty is elevated. Together with the baseline, our framework provides a reference for RI agents to conduct model selection in both information acquisition and portfolio design.

AI.tldr: 本文通过引入随机利率扩展了Huang和Liu（2007）的框架，研究了理性疏忽（RI）下最优信号精度对终端效用的影响。研究发现，在利率波动下，RI投资者通过联合优化信号精度和资产配置，可以获得比恒定利率基准更高的预期终端效用。此外，短期债券偏好并不一定导致投资行为，实际配置取决于资产组合。随着波动增加，投资者从信息节约转向提高信号精度以做出及时反应。模型还解释了角点解的出现，即当隐藏状态的边际效用超过其获取成本时，投资者会完全关注利率或市场信号。
AI.research_question: 在随机利率环境下，理性疏忽投资者如何通过优化信号精度和资产配置来提高终端效用？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探索利率波动对理性疏忽投资者决策的影响，以及如何通过模型优化信息获取和资产配置。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Huang和Liu（2007）的理性疏忽框架，引入随机利率扩展模型。
AI.method: 通过理论建模分析随机利率下信号精度和资产配置的联合优化，并与恒定利率基准进行比较。
AI.findings: 在利率波动下，联合优化信号精度和资产配置可提高终端效用；投资者行为随波动增加从信息节约转向信号精度提升；模型揭示了角点解的出现条件。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了理性疏忽理论，引入随机利率并揭示了信号精度与资产配置的互动机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为理性疏忽投资者在利率波动环境下的模型选择和投资决策提供了参考。

reference: 109 Marquette Law Review (forthcoming 2025); Arizona Legal Studies Discussion Paper 25-14
title: Public Private Property
affiliations: James E. Rogers College of Law The University of Arizona

detail.title: Public Private Property

publicationDetails.journalName: University of Arizona James E. Rogers College of Law Legal Studies Research Paper Series

detail.abstract:
Many struggles are being fought in America today around regulation and redistribution of private property rights: between owners’ right to develop land and society’s need for environmental conservation; between landlords’ privilege to charge higher rents and society’s need for affordable housing, between property owners’ desire for protection from negative effects and unhoused persons’ need to live in the only space accessible to them, etc. These struggles, however, are doomed by a widely shared notion that public and private are inherent qualities in a zero-sum game. This Article refutes this notion. Building upon Legal Realist, post-Realist, and poststructuralist insights, it argues that public and private are effects of publicizing and privatizing acts. They are not opponents, but accomplices that depend on each other for meaning. Property is both public and private. It is public when, to the extent, and precisely because it is private, and vice versa. A healthy property system must embrace the paradigmatic status of both private and public property. Recognizing the value of one but denying that of the other is to build a chair with half its legs.

This Article attributes the current conflicts around property regulation and redistribution to a lack of public property paradigm in American law. To fill this gap the Article presents a public property paradigm as a companion strategy to the existing private property paradigm. The core of this public property paradigm is a general and unconditional right for everyone in America to have and enjoy essential property rights such as housing and ecological commons. The Article grounds this public property paradigm on the dual human condition of transcendence (freedom) and facticity (fixedness), drawing from phenomenology, Hegelian freedom, Vulnerability Theory, and feminist theory.

This Article is radical, not so much because of the institutions it proposes, but because of how it gets there by taking a highly eclectic approach, borrowing from diametrically opposing theories of property and the human condition, and building a theoretical house that is more capacious than a pure theory would allow. The borrowed theories are compatible in this Article, but only with a heavy dose of pragmatism and a deep commitment to cultural and political pluralism.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了公共与私人财产权对立的传统观念，提出它们是相互依存的效应，而非零和关系。文章通过法律现实主义、后结构主义等理论，构建了一个公共财产范式，主张每个人都应享有住房和生态公地等基本财产权。
AI.research_question: 如何解决美国财产权监管与再分配中的冲突？
AI.motivation: 当前美国财产权冲突源于公共财产范式的缺失，导致公共与私人财产被视为对立。
AI.theoretical_framework: 法律现实主义、后结构主义、现象学、黑格尔自由理论、脆弱性理论和女性主义理论。
AI.method: 通过理论分析，结合多种对立理论，构建公共财产范式。
AI.findings: 公共与私人财产是相互依存的效应，而非对立；公共财产范式是解决冲突的关键。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出公共与私人财产相互依存的新理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为解决财产权冲突提供了公共财产范式的实践策略。
